Syu Tak-nwa (Level 20).allSaves: +3 status to all saves vs. conjuration

Takatorra (Daitengu Form).name: Takatorra (Daitengu Form)

Toughest Teamwork: Wind Shell.name: Toughest Teamwork: Wind Shell
Toughest Teamwork: Wind Shell.description:
Trigger An ally within 60 feet is targeted by a physical ranged attack

Effect Takatorra wraps their ally in a protective shell of air. The ally gains a +4 status bonus to AC against physical ranged attacks until the beginning of their next turn.

Airflow Blades.name: Airflow Blades
Airflow Blades.description: Takatorra extends the cutting surface of their blades with high-pressure airflow. Until the end of their turn, their blades have a reach of 15 feet.

Disarming Whirl.name: Disarming Whirl
Disarming Whirl.description: Takatorra spins, striking at their foes' weapons. Takatorra attempts an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} against each enemy within their melee reach. Each attempt counts toward Takatorra's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until they have made all the attempts.

+2 status to all saves vs. air and elect.name: +2 status to all saves vs. air and electricity

Blade Barrage.description:
Takatorra unleashes a flurry of attacks. Takatorra makes five melee Strikes. They gain a cumulative +2 circumstance bonus to damage for each successful Strike. If one target is hit with at least two of these Strikes, they also take @Damage[2d6[bleed]]. They then become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of their next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.aMQxiTCdTxVcradv]{Effect: Blade Barrage}
Blade Barrage.name: Blade Barrage

equipment-Tengu Gale Blade.name: Tengu Gale Blade
equipment-Tengu Gale Blade.description: This fan-shaped sword, designed by members of the tengu ancestry, has five broad blades that join at its hilt. Tengu sailors also use gale blades as makeshift weather vanes, as the sword spins to show the wind's direction when loosely held aloft.

Takatorra (Daitengu Form).allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. air and electricity

Toughest Teamwork: Catapult Ally.name: Toughest Teamwork: Catapult Ally
Toughest Teamwork: Catapult Ally.description:
Trigger An ally using a move action moves within reach of Tino's kanabo

Effect Tino scoops his ally with his kanabo and flings them 30 feet in any direction. They can continue any remainder of their movement from their landing location

Earth-Shattering Strike.description:
Requirements Tino's previous action was to successfully Strike an enemy with a weapon that dealt bludgeoning damage

Effect A shockwave blasts out from the force of Tino's strike. Tino attempts a single Athletics check again the Fortitude DC of all enemies within 15 feet. Regardless of the result of the check, all terrain within the area becomes difficult terrain as the ground is cracked into loose shards.

Critical Success Tino pushes the creature 10 feet, knocks it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and deals @Damage[6d6[bludgeoning]] damage to it.

Success Tino pushes the creature 10 feet and knocks it prone.

Failure Tino pushes the creature 10 feet.
Earth-Shattering Strike.name: Earth-Shattering Strike

A Kanabo to an Oni.name: A Kanabo to an Oni
A Kanabo to an Oni.description: Tino loses himself further to the oni, pulling out even more strength. He makes a kanabo Strike that deals two additional weapon dice of damage.

Wall of Iron.description: Tino raises his kanabo defensively, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.
Wall of Iron.name: Wall of Iron

Flurry of Blows.name: Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: Tino makes two Strikes with his fist or with a monk weapon. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

Stalwart Guardian.name: Stalwart Guardian
Stalwart Guardian.description: Tino gains a reaction at the start of each enemy's turn that he can use only during that enemy's turn.

equipment-+3 Major Striking Kanabo.name: +3 Major Striking Kanabo
equipment-+3 Major Striking Kanabo.description: While many greatclubs are intricately carved, others are little more than a sturdy tree branch. These massive clubs are too heavy to wield with only one hand.

Poisonous Floodwaters.name: Poisonous Floodwaters
Poisonous Floodwaters.description: 10 feet. Yabin is surrounded by magically generated waist-deep poisonous waters. Enemies that enter the water are exposed to his white serpent venom. The aura is difficult terrain for creatures without a swim Speed. Every time Yabin Casts a Spell, the aura increases in radius by 5 feet, up to a maximum of 60 feet. He can activate or suppress this aura as a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

Rattling Magic.name: Rattling Magic
Rattling Magic.description: Yabin substitutes all spellcasting components when Casting a Spell with rattling of his tail. This has the concentrate trait.

White Serpent Venom.name: White Serpent Venom
White Serpent Venom.description:
Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:36]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} (1 round)

Toughest Teamwork: Envenomed Strike.description:
Trigger An ally within 20 feet makes a Strike that would deal piercing or slashing damage and hasn't yet rolled the attack roll

Effect Yabin spits venom on his ally's weapon. The Strike, if it hits, also exposes the target to Yabin's white serpent venom. If the Strike misses, the venom evaporates off immediately.
Toughest Teamwork: Envenomed Strike.name: Toughest Teamwork: Envenomed Strike

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.description:
You send a dart of force streaking toward a creature that you can see. It automatically hits and deals 1d4+1 force damage. For each additional action you use when Casting the Spell, increase the number of missiles you shoot by one, to a maximum of three missiles for 3 actions. You choose the target for each missile individually. If you shoot more than one missile at the same target, combine the damage before applying bonuses or penalties to damage, resistances, weaknesses, and so forth.

Heightened (+2) You shoot one additional missile with each action you spend.

Polar Ray.name: Polar Ray
Polar Ray.description:
You fire a blue-white ray of freezing air and sleet that deals 10d8 cold damage. Make a spell attack roll against the target.

Critical Success The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}

Success The target takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d8

Disappearance.name: Disappearance
Disappearance.description: You shroud a creature from others' senses. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, not just to sight but to all senses, allowing the target to count as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} no matter what precise and imprecise senses an observer might have. It's still possible for a creature to find the target by Seeking, looking for disturbed dust, hearing gaps in the sound spectrum, or finding some other way to discover the presence of an otherwise-undetectable creature.

Horrid Wilting.name: Horrid Wilting
Horrid Wilting.description:
You pull the moisture from the targets' bodies, dealing 10d10 void damage. Creatures made of water (such as water elementals) and plant creatures use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of their saving throw. Creatures whose bodies contain no significant moisture (such as earth elementals) are immune to horrid wilting.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

Prismatic Wall.name: Prismatic Wall
Prismatic Wall.description:
You create an opaque wall of shimmering, multicolored light. The wall is straight and vertical, stretching 60 feet long and 30 feet high. You must form the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. You can pass through the wall and ignore its effects. The wall sheds bright light out to 20 feet on each side (and dim light to the next 20 feet). Creatures other than you that come into the wall's light must attempt a Will save; they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round on a success, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round on a failure, and Blinded for 1 minute on a critical failure. They are then temporarily immune to the blinding effect for 1 hour.

A prismatic wall has seven different layers, each a different color. Red, orange, yellow, and green have the effect of a 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.forsqeofEszBNtLq]{Chromatic Wall} spell of that color, and the others have the effect of a 7th-rank Chromatic Wall spell of that color. A creature that tries to pass through the wall must attempt a saving throw against each component wall. The effects take place simultaneously, so a creature turned to stone by the blue wall is still treated as a creature for the indigo and violet walls.

The wall as a whole is immune to counteracting effects of the wall's level or lower; each color must be counteracted by its specific spell, as described in chromatic wall. This must be done in order (red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, then violet). A given color can't be affected until the previous color is counteracted. Counteracting a color wall removes that color's effect from the wall, and counteracting them all ends prismatic wall. You can Dismiss the spell.

Scintillating Pattern.name: Scintillating Pattern
Scintillating Pattern.description:
A field of cascading, ever-changing colors manifests in the air. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} while inside the pattern, as are those within 20 feet of the pattern's area. A creature must attempt a Will save if it is inside the pattern when you cast it, enters the pattern, ends its turn within the pattern, or uses a Seek or Interact action on the pattern. A creature currently affected by the pattern doesn't need to attempt new saves.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. After the Stunned condition ends, the creature is Confused for the remaining duration of the spell.

Disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate.description:
You fire a green ray at your target. Make a spell attack. You deal 12d10 damage, and the target must attempt a basic Fortitude save. On a critical hit, treat the save result as one degree worse. A creature reduced to 0 HP is reduced to fine powder; its gear remains. An object you hit is destroyed (no save), regardless of Hardness, unless it's an artifact or similarly hard to destroy. A single casting can destroy no more than a 10-foot cube of matter. This automatically destroys any force construct, such as a wall of force.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d10.

Eclipse Burst.name: Eclipse Burst
Eclipse Burst.description:
A globe of freezing darkness explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 cold damage to creatures in the area, plus 8d4 additional void damage to living creatures. Each creature in the area must attempt a Reflex save. If the globe overlaps with an area of magical light or affects a creature affected by magical light, eclipse burst attempts to counteract the light effect.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} by the darkness for an unlimited duration.

Heightened (+1) The cold damage increases by 1d10 and the void damage against the living increases by 1d4.

Mask of Terror.name: Mask of Terror
Mask of Terror.description:
The target appears to be a gruesome and terrifying creature. The effect is unique to each observer, so a human viewing the target might see a demon with bloody fangs, but a demon observing the target might see a glowing angelic visage. When any creature attempts a hostile action against the target, the creature must attempt a Will save. It is then temporarily immune until the end of its next turn.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} before using its action.

Critical Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}, and its action fails and is wasted.

Heightened (8th) You can target up to 5 creatures. If a creature uses a hostile action or reaction that affects multiple targets simultaneously, it needs to attempt only one save against mask of terror.

True Seeing.name: True Seeing
True Seeing.description: You see things within 60 feet as they actually are. The GM rolls a secret counteract check against any illusion or transmutation in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether you see through it (for instance, if the check succeeds against a polymorph spell, you can see the creature's true form, but you don't end the polymorph spell).

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description:
You discharge a powerful bolt of lightning at the target, dealing 8d12 electricity damage. The target must attempt a basic Reflex save. The electricity arcs to another creature within 30 feet of the first target, jumps to another creature within 30 feet of that target, and so on. You can end the chain at any point. You can't target the same creature more than once, and you must have line of effect to all targets. Roll the damage only once, and apply it to each target (halving or doubling as appropriate for its saving throw outcome). The chain ends if any one of the targets critically succeeds at its save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

Feeblemind.name: Feeblemind
Feeblemind.description:
You drastically reduce the target's mental faculties. The target must attempt a Will save. The effects of this curse can be removed only through remove curse or another effect that targets curses.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} with an unlimited duration.

Critical Failure The target's intellect is permanently reduced below that of an animal, and it treats its Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom modifiers as -5. It loses all class abilities that require mental faculties, including all spellcasting. If the target is a PC, they become an NPC under the GM's control.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description:
A roaring blast of fire appears at a spot you designate, dealing 6d6 fire damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Spellwrack.name: Spellwrack
Spellwrack.description:
You cause any spells cast on the target to spill out their energy in harmful surges. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success Whenever the target becomes affected by a spell with a duration, the target takes @Damage[2d12[persistent,force]] damage. Each time it takes persistent force damage from spellwrack, it reduces the remaining duration of spells affecting it by 1 round. Only a successful Arcana check against your spell DC can help the target recover from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Damage}; the curse and the Persistent Damage end after 1 minute.

Failure As success, but the curse and Persistent Damage do not end on their own.

Critical Failure As failure, but the persistent force damage is 4d12.

Cloak of Colors.name: Cloak of Colors
Cloak of Colors.description:
A cloak of swirling colors shrouds the target. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} while adjacent to it, and attacking the target causes a brilliant flash of light. A creature that hits the target with a melee attack must attempt a Will save.The creature is temporarily immune until the end of its turn; this effect has the incapacitation trait.

Success The attacker is unaffected.

Failure The attacker is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The attacker is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.

Freedom of Movement.name: Freedom of Movement
Freedom of Movement.description: You repel effects that would hinder a creature or slow its movement. While under this spell's effect, the target ignores effects that would give them a circumstance penalty to Speed. When they attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} an effect that has them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, they automatically succeed unless the effect is magical and of a higher level than the freedom of movement spell.

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description:
Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 6 creatures.

Acid Splash.name: Acid Splash
Acid Splash.description:
You splash a glob of acid that splatters your target and nearby creatures. Make a spell attack. If you hit, you deal 1d6 acid damage plus 1 splash acid damage. On a critical success, the target also takes @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2))[persistent,acid]] damage.

Heightened (3rd) The initial damage increases to 2d6, and the persistent damage increases to 2.

Heightened (5th) The initial damage increases to 3d6, the persistent damage increases to 3, and the splash damage increases to 2.

Heightened (7th) The initial damage increases to 4d6, the persistent damage increases to 4, and the splash damage increases to 3.

Heightened (9th) The initial damage increases to 5d6, the persistent damage increases to 5, and the splash damage increases to 4.

Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

Chromatic Wall.name: Chromatic Wall
Chromatic Wall.description:
You create an opaque wall of light in a single vibrant color. The wall is straight and vertical, stretching 60 feet long and 30 feet high. If the wall would pass through a creature, the spell is lost. The wall sheds bright light for 20 feet on each side, and dim light for the next 20 feet. You can ignore the wall's effects.

Roll 1d4 to determine the color of the wall. Each color has a particular effect on items, effects, or creatures that attempt to pass through. Chromatic wall can't be counteracted normally; rather, each color is automatically counteracted when targeted by a specific spell, even if that spell's rank is lower than that of chromatic wall.

  1. Red The wall destroys ranged weapon ammunition (such as arrows and crossbow bolts) that would pass through, and it deals 20 fire damage to anyone passing through, with a basic Reflex save. Cone of cold can counteract a red chromatic wall.
  2. Orange The wall destroys thrown weapons that would pass through, and it deals 25 acid damage to anyone passing through, with a basic Reflex save. Gust of wind can counteract an orange chromatic wall.
  3. Yellow The wall stops acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, and void effects from passing through, and it deals 30 electricity damage to anyone passing through, with a basic Reflex save. Disintegrate can counteract a yellow chromatic wall.
  4. Green The wall stops toxins, gases, and breath weapons from passing through. It deals 10 poison damage to anyone passing through and makes them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute. A basic Fortitude save reduces the damage and negates the Enfeebled condition on a success. Passwall can counteract a green chromatic wall.

Heightened (7th) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour. Roll 1d8 to determine the wall's color; the results for 5-8 are below. A red, orange, yellow, or green wall deals an extra 10 damage.

  1. Blue The wall stops auditory, petrification, and visual effects from passing through, and creatures passing through are subject to the effects of flesh to stone. Magic missile can counteract a blue chromatic wall.
  2. Indigo The wall stops divination and mental effects from passing through, and those passing through are subject to the effects of warp mind. Searing light can counteract an indigo chromatic wall.
  3. Violet The wall prevents spells from targeting the other side (area effects still cross as normal). Creatures passing through must succeed at a Will save or they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute; on a critical failure, the creature is instead sent to another plane, with the effect of plane shift. Dispel magic can counteract a violet chromatic wall.
  4. Reroll, and creatures that pass through the wall take a -2 circumstance penalty to their saves.

Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Deadly Disarm.name: 致命卸武 Deadly Disarm
Deadly Disarm.description: 灵巧战士成功的卸武检定会对目标额外造成2d6点精准伤害。

Tumbling Attack.name: 翻滚攻击 Tumbling Attack
Tumbling Attack.description: 灵巧战士行走一次。在移动中，他可以穿越一个生物占据空间且不触发反应动作。当他以此法穿越生物占据空间时，该生物直到灵巧战士回合结束前@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。若灵巧战士移动结束时近战触及内至少有一个敌人，他可以对触及内的生物发动一次近战打击。

Nimble Dodge.name: 灵巧躲避 Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 灵巧战士被自己看得见的攻击者进行一次近战或远程攻击

效果 灵巧战士对抗触发攻击的AC获得+2环境加值。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 灵巧战士的打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物造成额外2d6精准伤害。

equipment-Sai.name: Sai
equipment-Sai.description: This piercing dagger is a metal spike flanked by a pair of prongs that can be used to trap an enemy's weapon.

equipment-Shuriken.name: Shuriken
equipment-Shuriken.description: This "throwing star" is a small piece of flat metal with sharp edges, designed to be flung with a flick of the wrist.

equipment-Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
equipment-Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

Agile Warrior (Nightmares).name: 灵巧战士 Agile Warrior (噩梦队)

Deadly Disarm.name: 致命卸武 Deadly Disarm
Deadly Disarm.description: 灵巧战士成功的卸武检定会对目标额外造成2d6点精准伤害。

Tumbling Attack.name: 翻滚攻击 Tumbling Attack
Tumbling Attack.description: 灵巧战士行走一次。在移动中，他可以穿越一个生物占据空间且不触发反应动作。当他以此法穿越生物占据空间时，该生物直到灵巧战士回合结束前@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。若灵巧战士移动结束时近战触及内至少有一个敌人，他可以对触及内的生物发动一次近战打击。

Nimble Dodge.name: 灵巧躲避 Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 灵巧战士被自己看得见的攻击者进行一次近战或远程攻击

效果 灵巧战士对抗触发攻击的AC获得+2环境加值。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 灵巧战士的打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物造成额外2d6精准伤害。

equipment-Sai.name: Sai
equipment-Sai.description: This piercing dagger is a metal spike flanked by a pair of prongs that can be used to trap an enemy's weapon.

equipment-Shuriken.name: Shuriken
equipment-Shuriken.description: This "throwing star" is a small piece of flat metal with sharp edges, designed to be flung with a flick of the wrist.

equipment-Halberd.name: Halberd
equipment-Halberd.description: This polearm has a relatively short, 5-foot shaft. The business end is a long spike with an axe blade attached.

equipment-Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
equipment-Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

Air Rift.name: 气流裂隙 Air Rift
Air Rift.stealthdetails: (大师) 注意到剧场中突然发生的意外
Air Rift.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:38|name:Air Rift Arcana|traits:hazard,environmental,magical,air]（大师）用魔法将裂隙缝合；@Check[nature|dc:40|name:Air Rift Nature|traits:hazard,environmental,magical,air]或@Check[survival|dc:40|name:Air Rift Survival|traits:hazard,environmental,magical,air]（传奇）打开足够多的门窗，降低狂风的烈度；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（反制等级7 级；反制DC34）反制气流裂隙。
Air Rift.hazarddescription: 舞台上撕开了一个通往气元素位面的入口，导致咆哮的风撕裂整个剧院。
Air Rift.routine:
（1 动作）风在该区域内以随机方向吹动，气流裂隙导致50尺内的生物和物品向上、下、北、南、东或西方向被吹走（投掷d6来决定具体方向）。该区域内的生物和物体必须尝试@Check[fortitude|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect,air,environmental,magical,hazard]豁免。如果一个生物撞上了另一个同样受此效果影响的物品或生物，则双方都会因为冲击而受到@Damage[(3d8+15)[bludgeoning]]伤害。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物被推离10尺，但是仅受到一半的冲击伤害。

失败 生物被推离20尺，被击倒地，受到全额冲击伤害。

大失败 生物被推离40尺，被击倒，受到双倍冲击伤害。

AC 40 vs. Reactions and Ranged Weapon At.name: 对抗反应动作和远程武器攻击为40

Earth Vulnerability.name: 岩土易伤 Earth Vulnerability
Earth Vulnerability.description: 气元素位面是土元素位面的对立面。任何带有土特征的法术或魔法效果，在瞄准裂隙50尺内的目标或区域时，每个法术环级（魔法物品、专长等每2个等级）都能对裂隙造成10点伤害。例如，对裂隙附近的生物施放3环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gPvtmKMRpg9I9D7H]{地缚术 Earthbind}能对裂隙造成30点伤害。

Weightlessness.name: 失重 Weightlessness
Weightlessness.description:
触发 一个生物进入裂隙50尺范围内

效果 气流裂隙在生物周围制造一个个体化的反重力场，持续1分钟。该生物能通过一个带有专注特征的自由动作，选择让重力将它们拉向任意方向。该生物可以沿着任何表面行走，或者选择一个方向在空中直线飞行。对于无主物品和无心智生物来说，这是微重力环境：它们会在原地漂浮，除非被推离表面。

Akila Stormheel.name: 阿基拉·暴风踵 Akila Stormheel
Akila Stormheel.blurb: 女性半身人翠绿玉枝旁听生

Agile Faller.name: 轻身落 Agile Faller
Agile Faller.description: 阿基拉受到的坠落伤害减半。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
阿基拉的面具和她的脸融合在了一起，她变成一只花豹，或变回半身人形态。在花豹形态下她只能使用啃咬打击（造成@Damage[(3d6+10)[piercing]]伤害，外加擒获）或带有灵巧特征的爪抓打击（造成@Damage[(3d4+10)[slashing]]伤害）

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Pounce.name: 猛扑 Pounce
Pounce.description: 阿基拉行走，然后打击。如果她此动作开始时为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}状态，则她在打击完成后依然保持藏匿。

Powerful Leap.name: 强力跳 Powerful Leap
Powerful Leap.description: 阿基拉跳跃最多50尺远10尺高，或最多25尺高10尺远。她能在跳跃途中的任意一点进行一次打击。如果她命中，她附带的冲击力会造成额外@Damage[8[bludgeoning]]伤害。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 阿基拉的打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的目标造成额外1d6精准伤害。

equipment-Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.
equipment-Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow

equipment-Katar.description: Also known as punching daggers, katars are characterized by their H-shaped hand grip that allows the blade to jut out from the knuckles.
equipment-Katar.name: Katar

equipment-Arrows.name: Arrows
equipment-Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

Quick Draw.name: 及时备战 Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: 战舞者以交互动作拔出武器，然后用它进行一次打击。

Shield Drum.name: 击打盾牌 Shield Drum
Shield Drum.description: 战舞者举盾，然后对敌人@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralizes}。

Threatening Dance.name: 威胁之舞 Threatening Dance
Threatening Dance.description:
战舞者选择先快步后@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EEDElIyin4z60PXx]{演出 Performs}，或者先表演后快步。将表演检定结果和战舞者触及内一个生物的意志DC 相比较。

大成功 生物对所有攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}，直到战舞者的下个回合开始。

成功 生物对战舞者之外的生物做出的下一次攻击措手不及，直到战舞者下回合开始。

equipment-Alchemist's Fire (Greater).name: Alchemist's Fire (Greater)
equipment-Alchemist's Fire (Greater).description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 3d8 fire damage, 3 persistent fire damage, and 3 fire splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Scimitar.name: Scimitar
equipment-Scimitar.description: This one-handed curved blade is sharp on one side.

equipment-Shield Boss.name: Shield Boss
equipment-Shield Boss.description: Typically a round, convex, or conical piece of thick metal attached to the center of a shield, a shield boss increases the bludgeoning damage of a shield bash.

Sturdy Shield (Greater).name: Sturdy Shield (Greater)
Sturdy Shield (Greater).description:
With a superior design and excellent craftsmanship, this steel shield has higher Hardness than its non-magical counterparts, making it harder to break and destroy.

The shield has Hardness 15, HP 120, and BT 60.

equipment-Bracers of Armor I.name: Bracers of Armor I
equipment-Bracers of Armor I.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

Angoyang.name: 旺宅猫 Angoyang
Angoyang.senses: 皮屑感官（1英里、模糊），黑暗视觉
Angoyang.publicNotes:
旺宅猫外观上就像个长有老虎黑纹的白花猫。它们有漂亮的丝质皮毛，锐利的蓝眼睛和长长的毛茸尾巴。然而，这看上去如画一般的猫咪伴侣实际上和外观大相径庭，旺宅猫是一种骇人的生物，其能剥开脸上的肉质层，露出大量长而带齿的触须。

尽管大部分猫都会躲开旺宅猫出没的地区，那些不幸碰见它们的猫会被带齿的触须缠住并吃掉。在旺宅猫居住的城镇里，养猫的人可能会发现他们心爱的宠物失踪了，但很快却会有一只毛茸茸的黑白花猫碰巧出现在他们的门口，睁着大眼睛看着他们，可爱地喵喵叫。旺宅猫几乎从不攻击它们的看护人，它们把看护人看作给自己喂食、清洁身体、并宠爱它们的忠实仆人，这些生物也因此会保护它们家里的人不受任何潜在的入侵者所伤。然而，一位忽视或者虐待旺宅猫的看护人往往会遭遇可怕的命运。不止一名验尸官或掘墓人在被指派清理前“主人”支离破碎的遗体后，无意中继承了一只旺宅猫。

Dander Scent (Imprecise) 1 mile.name: 皮屑感官（1英里，模糊）
Dander Scent (Imprecise) 1 mile.description: 旺宅猫能模糊地感知到1英里内任何曾经接触过它皮毛的生物的位置。

I Am A Cat.name: 我是只猫 I Am A Cat
I Am A Cat.description: 旺宅猫在伪装成一只猫的时候欺骗检定值和DC自动取47。

Silent Yowl.name: 寂静怒号 Silent Yowl
Silent Yowl.description:
旺宅猫张开它的嘴，卸下天真的伪装，释放出可怕的触须，并发出一声令人毛骨悚然的尖叫，以一个它能看到的生物为目标，造成@Damage[8d10[mental]]伤害。只有目标才能听到这声尖叫。目标必须成功通过@Check[will|dc:30|traits:damaging-effect]豁免，因为吼声撕裂了他们的心智。

大成功 目标不受伤害并在24小时内免疫此能力。

成功 目标受到一半伤害。

失败 目标受到全部伤害并获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

大失败 目标受到双倍伤害并获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}。

Slow Blink.name: 缓慢眨眼 Slow Blink
Slow Blink.description: 旺宅猫轻轻地喵一声，慢慢地对着一个生物眨两次眼。目标必须进行@Check[will|dc:31]豁免。大成功时目标不受影响并在24小时内免疫此能力。否则，这只动物就会被抚摸旺宅猫丝绸般皮毛的冲动所征服，被它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}。如果旺宅猫攻击该生物，该生物可以在下回合开始时尝试一次新的豁免。

Anugobu Apprentice.name: 阿努学徒 Anugobu Apprentice
Anugobu Apprentice.publicNotes:
在彤嘎民间被视为神授的艺术家和工匠之才而颇具声誉，原居于民那塔岛心， 阿努人是一群满心好奇的小型人型生物。在数不尽的故事中，描述了阿努人潜藏在民那塔城市周边，修理并强化其他人型生物的构造物和建筑的事迹。因为他们小巧且瘦弱的体型，阿努人据说在面对较大的人和生物时都极其害羞。在让所有人走出室内一同欢聚的节日， 民间传说中阿努人总会无一例外的躲在在黑暗中或者只是觉得未被别人察觉的地方，偷偷进行着精巧创造和修复物件之事。许多有名的彤嘎民间故事中，总有类似于被自然灾害破坏的房屋在第二天早上奇迹般复原，或者未完成的建筑工程，例如修到一半的桥梁神秘完成让工人好奇是谁修建的内容。

根据大多数传说，阿努人是无可匹敌的建筑与工程学大师，并且运用这种专长修建了繁复的建筑或者极大幅度强化了已有建筑。有些人对这些超乎寻常的故事抱有怀疑，但是任何见证过一名阿努人在建筑墙壁上和屋檐下往返走动的人都大开眼界从而相信这些传说绝非胡编滥造。事实上，虽然阿努人全都拥有着锻造和建造的内在天赋，并且可以在墙壁和屋檐行走，但他们和任何类人物种一样个体千差万别。阿努人有着和辛族人相似的外表，但个头极其小。大多数阿努人身高不超过2尺并且体重不超过30磅——迷你的体型让他们可以穿越缝隙，并且不被高个人种注意到。几乎所有可验证的与阿努人遭遇都发生在民那塔岛上。

在大多数阿努人文化中，每个阿努人都在寻求一生的终极目标，他们将其称为他们的巡游。巡游指的是任何一项无人从事并让阿努人欣喜若狂的具体事项。任何事项都可成为阿努人的巡游，从修复宏伟教堂到前往神秘洞穴狩猎具体的野兽。当一名阿努人找到了自身的巡游，他们都会陷入肃然起敬的出神之中并将自己全身心投入完成工作中，有时一次事项会持续花费数日或数周时光。当一名阿努人完成他们巡游最后的细枝末节后，他们的一生辛劳即圆满了，然后他们会用余生来协助其他阿努人的巡游或者招收学徒以传授自己的技能。

大多数年轻阿努人都会参与于不止一项的学徒训练以图在他们所选行业中习得先进的技术。此处描述的学徒专精于建造和工程学，其实阿努人也一样喜欢从事烹饪、狩猎、裁剪或任何会引起他们兴趣的真实事物。

Planar Workshop.name: 工坊位面 Planar Workshop
Planar Workshop.description: 一名阿努人天生固有和一个小型、袖珍次元的链接，他们通常将其称为他们的工坊。工坊是一个异次元10尺方型空间。工坊保管着阿努人收藏的工具和材料。一个阿努人可以用一个具有专注和操作特征的动作进入或离开他们的工坊位面。在他们的工坊内时，阿努人获得对所有伤害类型（除了力场）抗性5 以及@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 concealment}状态。工坊只有阿努人处于其内时才可见。

Stone Step.name: 砖石行走 Stone Step
Stone Step.description: 阿努人可以不费吹灰之力的附着在任何处理过和人造的表面上，让他们得以在墙上行走并站在屋檐上。

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

Mending (At Will).name: Mending (At Will)
Mending (At Will).description:
You repair the target item. You restore 5 Hit Points per spell rank to the target, potentially removing the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition if this repairs it past the item's Broken Threshold. You can't replace lost pieces or repair an object that's been completely destroyed.

Heightened (2nd) You can target a non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

Heightened (3rd) You can target a non-magical object of 2 Bulk or less, or a magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

Create Water.name: Create Water
Create Water.description: As you cup your hands, water begins to flow forth from them. You create 2 gallons of water. If no one drinks it, it evaporates after 1 day.

Floating Disk.name: Floating Disk
Floating Disk.description:
A disk of magical force materializes adjacent to you. This disk is 2 feet in diameter and follows 5 feet behind you, floating just above the ground. It holds up to 5 Bulk of objects (though they must be able to fit and balance on its surface). Any objects atop the disk fall to the ground when the spell ends.

The spell ends if a creature tries to ride atop the disk, if the disk is overloaded, if anyone tries to lift or force the disk higher above the ground, or if you move more than 30 feet away from the disk.

Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
Prestidigitation.description:
The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of four options.

  • Cook Cool, warm, or flavor 1 pound of nonliving material.
  • Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
  • Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragile-it can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
  • Tidy Color, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. You can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.

Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as you Sustain the Spell.

Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Unseen Servant (At Will).name: Unseen Servant (At Will)
Unseen Servant (At Will).description:
You summon an unseen servant, which you can command as part of Sustaining the Spell. It serves you until its Hit Points are reduced to 0, at which point the spell ends, or until you stop Sustaining the Spell. The unseen servant gains the summoned trait.

Unseen Servant [Creature] [-1] [No Alignment] [Medium]

AC 13, Fort +0, Ref +4, Will +0 HP 4

Immunities disease, mental, non-magical attacks, paralysis, poison, precision, unconscious

Resistances all damage 5 (except force or ghost touch)

Speed fly 30 feet

Force Body An unseen servant's physical body is made of force. It can't use attack actions. It can move and use Interact actions to do things such as fetch objects, open unstuck or unlocked doors, hold chairs, and clean. It can't pass through solid objects.

equipment-Artisan's Tools.name: Artisan's Tools
equipment-Artisan's Tools.description: You need these tools to create items from raw materials with the Craft skill. Different sets are needed for different work, as determined by the GM; for example, blacksmith's tools differ from woodworker's tools.

Anugobu Wondercrafter.name: 阿努巡游工匠 Anugobu Wondercrafter
Anugobu Wondercrafter.publicNotes:
在彤嘎民间被视为神授的艺术家和工匠之才而颇具声誉，原居于民那塔岛心， 阿努人是一群满心好奇的小型人型生物。在数不尽的故事中，描述了阿努人潜藏在民那塔城市周边，修理并强化其他人型生物的构造物和建筑的事迹。因为他们小巧且瘦弱的体型，阿努人据说在面对较大的人和生物时都极其害羞。在让所有人走出室内一同欢聚的节日， 民间传说中阿努人总会无一例外的躲在在黑暗中或者只是觉得未被别人察觉的地方，偷偷进行着精巧创造和修复物件之事。许多有名的彤嘎民间故事中，总有类似于被自然灾害破坏的房屋在第二天早上奇迹般复原，或者未完成的建筑工程，例如修到一半的桥梁神秘完成让工人好奇是谁修建的内容。

在大多数阿努人文化中，每个阿努人都在寻求一生的终极目标，他们将其称为他们的巡游。巡游指的是任何一项无人从事并让阿努人欣喜若狂的具体事项。任何事项都可成为阿努人的巡游，从修复宏伟教堂到前往神秘洞穴狩猎具体的野兽。当一名阿努人找到了自身的巡游，他们都会陷入肃然起敬的出神之中并将自己全身心投入完成工作中，有时一次事项会持续花费数日或数周时光。当一名阿努人完成他们巡游最后的细枝末节后，他们的一生辛劳即圆满了，然后他们会用余生来协助其他阿努人的巡游或者招收学徒以传授自己的技能。

一旦阿努学徒开始自己的巡游，他们会游历世界在任何地方从事小型工程来保持技术。但是，一个阿努人除非找到自己的巡游，否则不能获得充满荣耀的巡游工匠之名。一旦他们发现并完成这样一次巡游，阿努人就被视作完全的成人。作为他们地位和经验的结晶，阿努人所拥有的技艺与魔法远超于同族大多数人。

Planar Workshop.name: 工坊位面 Planar Workshop
Planar Workshop.description: 一名阿努人天生固有和一个小型、袖珍次元的链接，他们通常将其称为他们的工坊。工坊是一个异次元10尺方型空间。工坊保管着阿努人收藏的工具和材料。一个阿努人可以用一个具有专注和操作特征的动作进入或离开他们的工坊位面。在他们的工坊内时，阿努人获得对所有伤害类型（除了力场）抗性5 以及@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 concealment}状态。工坊只有阿努人处于其内时才可见。

Blink.description:
You blink quickly between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane. You gain resistance 5 to all damage (except force). You can Sustain the Spell to vanish and reappear 10 feet away in a random direction determined by the GM; the movement doesn't trigger reactions. At the end of your turn, you vanish and reappear as above.

Heightened (+2) The resistance increases by 3.
Blink.name: Blink

Creation (At Will).description:
You conjure a temporary object from eldritch energy. It must be of vegetable matter (such as wood or paper) and 5 cubic feet or smaller. It can't rely on intricate artistry or complex moving parts, never fulfills a cost or the like, and can't be made of precious materials or materials with a rarity of uncommon or higher. It is obviously temporarily conjured, and thus can't be sold or passed off as a genuine item.

Heightened (5th) The item is metal and can include common minerals, like feldspar or quartz.
Creation (At Will).name: Creation (At Will)

Mending (At Will).name: Mending (At Will)
Mending (At Will).description:
You repair the target item. You restore 5 Hit Points per spell rank to the target, potentially removing the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition if this repairs it past the item's Broken Threshold. You can't replace lost pieces or repair an object that's been completely destroyed.

Heightened (2nd) You can target a non-magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

Heightened (3rd) You can target a non-magical object of 2 Bulk or less, or a magical object of 1 Bulk or less.

Unseen Servant [Creature] [-1] [No Alignment] [Medium]

AC 13, Fort +0, Ref +4, Will +0 HP 4

Immunities disease, mental, non-magical attacks, paralysis, poison, precision, unconscious

Resistances all damage 5 (except force or ghost touch)

Speed fly 30 feet

Force Body An unseen servant's physical body is made of force. It can't use attack actions. It can move and use Interact actions to do things such as fetch objects, open unstuck or unlocked doors, hold chairs, and clean. It can't pass through solid objects.
Unseen Servant (At Will).name: Unseen Servant (At Will)

equipment-Artisan's Tools (Sterling).name: Artisan's Tools (Sterling)
equipment-Artisan's Tools (Sterling).description:
You need these tools to create items from raw materials with the Craft skill. Sterling artisan's tools give you a +1 item bonus to the check.

Different sets are needed for different work, as determined by the GM; for example, blacksmith's tools differ from woodworker's tools.

Pinning Shot.name: 锚定射击 Pinning Shot
Pinning Shot.description: 箭道精英进行一次长弓打击。若攻击命中，不造成伤害，而是直接触发弓武器组的重击专精效果。若该次攻击为重击，则目标必须用互动动作成功2次运动检定才能拔出箭矢获得自由。

Rain of Arrows.name: 箭雨 Rain of Arrows
Rain of Arrows.description: 箭道精英同时射出数只箭，瞄准60尺内@Template[burst|distance:10]{10尺爆发}范围内所有自选目标。箭道精英进行一次长弓打击，然后将攻击结果和爆发范围内所有目标AC 进行对抗。箭道精英只骰一次伤害骰，应用到每个命中目标上。计算多次攻击减值时，箭雨视为三次攻击。

Point-Blank Shot.name: 近程射击 Point-Blank Shot
Point-Blank Shot.description: 箭道精英忽略远射武器特征带来的攻击骰减值。

equipment-Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow
equipment-Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.

equipment-Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.
equipment-Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor

Arms of Balance (Jivati Rovat).name: 吉瓦蒂·罗瓦特(八臂调和) Arms of Balance (Jivati Rovat)

Magma's Grasp.name: 熔岩之握 Magma's Grasp
Magma's Grasp.description:
武僧释放出一股强劲的气，具体效果取决于武僧所协调的能量类型。武僧无法在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Magma's Grasp]]{1d4轮}内再次使用此能力。

吉瓦蒂的吐息灼烧10尺内每个生物的灵魂，造成@Damage[8d6[fire]]伤害，每个生物都必须尝试@Check[will|dc:33|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到一半伤害。

失败 生物受到全伤害和@Damage[1d6[persistent,fire]]伤害 ，并且失去1个聚能点。如果目标没有聚能点，生物会失去一个还未施放随机的最高环位的准备法术或法术位（最高6环）。

大失败 类似失败，但是生物受到双倍伤害和@Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]]。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: 武僧进行两次无武装打击。若两次命中同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。

Wild Winds Stance.description:
You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance. You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.eeAlh6edygcZIz9c]{Stance: Wild Winds Stance}
Wild Winds Stance.name: Wild Winds Stance

Wind Jump.name: Wind Jump
Wind Jump.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall.

Heightened (6th) At the end of your turn, you can attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:30] check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5MI2c9IgxfSeGZQo]{Spell Effect: Wind Jump}

equipment-+2 Greater Striking Flaming Ha.name: +2 Greater Striking Flaming Handwraps of Mighty Blows
equipment-+2 Greater Striking Flaming Ha.description:
As you invest these embroidered strips of cloth, you must meditate and slowly wrap them around your hands. These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

equipment-Bracers of Armor II.name: Bracers of Armor II
equipment-Bracers of Armor II.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +2 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

prototypeToken.name: 吉瓦蒂·罗瓦特(八臂调和)

Arms of Balance (Pravan Majinapti).name: 普拉万·马吉纳普蒂(八臂调和) Arms of Balance (Pravan Majinapti)

Breath of the Glacier.name: 冰川之息 Breath of the Glacier
Breath of the Glacier.description:
武僧释放出一股强劲的气，具体效果取决于武僧所协调的能量类型。武僧无法在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath of the Glacier]]{1d4轮}内再次使用此能力。

普拉万打出一阵寒风，对@Template[cone|distance:30]{30尺锥形}造成@Damage[10d6[cold]]伤害。区域内的生物会全身结冰，必须尝试一次@Check[reflex|dc:33|traits:damaging-effect]豁免，由此能力带来的速度惩罚或禁足效果持续到生物破拆冰块或脱逃（DC都是37），或直到生物受到至少30火焰伤害为止。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到一半伤害，并且速度遭受-5状态减值。

失败 生物受到全伤害并且速度遭受-15尺状态减值。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害并被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: 武僧进行两次无武装打击。若两次命中同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。

Wild Winds Stance.description:
You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance. You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.eeAlh6edygcZIz9c]{Stance: Wild Winds Stance}
Wild Winds Stance.name: Wild Winds Stance

Wind Jump.name: Wind Jump
Wind Jump.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall.

Heightened (6th) At the end of your turn, you can attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:30] check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5MI2c9IgxfSeGZQo]{Spell Effect: Wind Jump}

equipment-+2 greater Striking Frost Hand.name: +2 greater Striking Frost Handwraps of Mighty Blows
equipment-+2 greater Striking Frost Hand.description:
As you invest these embroidered strips of cloth, you must meditate and slowly wrap them around your hands. These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

equipment-Bracers of Armor II.name: Bracers of Armor II
equipment-Bracers of Armor II.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +2 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

prototypeToken.name: 普拉万·马吉纳普蒂(八臂调和)

Arms of Balance (Ranya Shibhatesh).name: 兰雅·什瓦纳特丝(八臂调和) Arms of Balance (Ranya Shibhatesh)

Draw of the Aurora.name: 电光牵引 Draw of the Aurora
Draw of the Aurora.description:
武僧释放出一股强劲的气，具体效果取决于武僧所协调的能量类型。武僧无法在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Draw of the Aurora]]{1d4轮}内再次使用此能力。

兰雅射出四道闪电，使生物带电磁化并被拉向自己。四根@Template[line|distance:60]{60尺直线}范围的电流，从兰雅所在处前后左右四个互成直角的方向延伸出来，造成@Damage[4d12[electricity]]伤害。影响区域内的每个生物必须尝试@Check[reflex|dc:33|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。如果该能力让某个无踪的生物发光，该生物对那些能看见他所在空间的生物来说视为藏匿（即便它隐形或潜行）。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到一半伤害，会发光直到兰娅的下个回合结束，并且被拉向兰娅5尺。

失败 生物受到全伤害，会发光直到武僧的下个回合结束，并且被拉向兰娅15尺。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害，发光1分钟，并且被拉向兰娅30尺。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: 武僧进行两次无武装打击。若两次命中同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。

Wild Winds Stance.description:
You take on the stance of the flowing winds, sending out waves of energy at a distance. You can make wind crash unarmed Strikes as ranged Strikes against targets within 30 feet. These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.eeAlh6edygcZIz9c]{Stance: Wild Winds Stance}
Wild Winds Stance.name: Wild Winds Stance

Wind Jump.description:

Heightened (6th) At the end of your turn, you can attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:30] check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5MI2c9IgxfSeGZQo]{Spell Effect: Wind Jump}

equipment-Bracers of Armor II.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +2 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

prototypeToken.name: 兰雅·什瓦纳特丝(八臂调和)

Arms of Balance (Usvani).name: 乌斯瓦利(八臂调和) Arms of Balance (Usvani)

Breath of the Volcano.name: 火山之息 Breath of the Volcano
Breath of the Volcano.description:
武僧释放出一股强劲的气，具体效果取决于武僧所协调的能量类型。武僧无法在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath of the Volcano]]{1d4轮}内再次使用此能力。

乌斯瓦利喷出一阵酸性毒烟，填满@Template[emanation|distance:15]{15 尺弥漫}范围。在此范围内开始回合的生物受到@Damage[12d6[acid]]伤害，并且必须尝试@Check[fortitude|dc:33|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到一半伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 生物受到全伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

大失败 生物承受双倍伤害且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: 武僧进行两次无武装打击。若两次命中同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。

These deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage, use the brawling group, and have the agile, nonlethal, propulsive, and unarmed traits. Wind crash Strikes ignore concealment and all cover.

While in wild winds stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks.

These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

equipment-Bracers of Armor II.name: Bracers of Armor II

Artus Rodrivan.name: 阿图斯·罗德里万 Artus Rodrivan

Soul Arrow.name: 灵魂之箭 Soul Arrow
Soul Arrow.description: 当阿图斯以长弓进行打击时，他能射出一支由他的灵魂所做成的箭。这支箭看起来像由纯净的光制成，在@Template[burst|distance:20]{20尺爆发}范围内造成明亮光照（在额外20尺范围内造成昏暗光照）。当阿图斯以灵魂之箭进行打击时掷出重击，目标会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}，直到阿图斯的下个回合结束。

Veering Miss.name: 逆转失手 Veering Miss
Veering Miss.description:
触发 阿图斯以灵魂之箭进行长弓打击，结果失手，但是并没有大失败

效果 箭矢转向，再次尝试攻击目标。阿图斯尝试一次新远程打击，使用和失手那次打击相同的多重攻击减值。转向的箭矢不计入阿图斯的多重攻击减值。这次新的攻击无视掩蔽和高等掩蔽。

Reactive Strike (Special).description:
Artus can use his soul arrow for attacks of opportunity against creatures within 10 feet.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]
Reactive Strike (Special).name: Reactive Strike (Special)

Attack of Opportunity (Special).description:
Artus can use his soul arrow for attacks of opportunity against creatures within 10 feet.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]
Attack of Opportunity (Special).name: Attack of Opportunity (Special)

equipment-Elven Curve Blade.name: Elven Curve Blade
equipment-Elven Curve Blade.description: Essentially a longer version of the scimitar, this traditional elven weapon has a thinner blade than its cousin.

equipment-Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow
equipment-Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.

equipment-Explorer's Clothing.name: Explorer's Clothing
equipment-Explorer's Clothing.description: Adventurers who don't wear armor travel in durable clothing. Though it's not armor and uses your unarmored defense proficiency, it still has a Dex Cap and can grant an item bonus to AC if etched with potency runes.

Berberoka.name: 夸巴洛卡 Berberoka
Berberoka.publicNotes:
夸巴洛卡是生活在森林和沼泽中的巨型类人生物，他们能够吞下巨量的水以致小池塘或湖泊干涸。回到自己所爱水塘但发现仅剩一个空空泥巴坑的生物通常都被夸巴洛卡所狩猎，夸巴洛卡潜藏在灌木丛间用大量反刍的激流淹没他的猎物

夸巴洛卡满是当地植物、小树和大块岩石装点的后背给予他们天然伪装，让他们可以藏于平原之上。当夸巴洛卡静候过路猎物时，习惯于伪装成干涸河床中的一块岩石造物。夸巴洛卡更常见于热带地区，当地人都知道在空荡池塘中要留出一大片空间，无论其中有多么肥美的鱼儿在其中游荡。但是，饥饿的旅人可能将其视为天神的恩赐，然后都统统命丧于夸巴洛卡的致命洪水。

Deep Breath.name: 深呼吸 Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: 夸巴洛卡可以屏住呼吸2个小时。

Fear of Crabs.name: 螃蟹恐惧 Fear of Crabs
Fear of Crabs.description:
如果夸巴洛卡看到一只螃蟹或者类似于螃蟹的生物，夸巴洛卡必须进行一次@Check[will|dc:33]。他们随后免疫于此10分钟。

大成功 夸巴洛卡不受影响

成功 夸巴洛卡@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

失败 夸巴洛卡陷入1轮@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}状态并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 4}。

Consume Lake.name: 一饮而尽 Consume Lake
Consume Lake.description:
夸巴洛卡从身边水源处喝下了大量水。如果水源的容量等同于或者大于他们自身大小，夸巴洛卡会每分钟消耗1500加仑水然后处于满溢状态。他们能以同样速率吐出水来。当处于满溢状态，夸巴洛卡可以使用喷吐激流动作，他们体型变为巨型并且速度下降到15尺。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.UxNq9uo1GpDYTi5Z]{效果：满溢}

Spray Water.name: 喷吐激流 Spray Water
Spray Water.description:
需求 夸巴洛卡处于满溢状态。

效果 夸巴洛卡喷涂出@Template[line|distance:60]水流冲击。所有区域内生物受到@Damage[6d8[bludgeoning]]伤害 (@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic]检定)。一旦失败，生物被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}并被推出5尺距离（如果大失败，则推出10尺）。

Infused Items.name: 灌注物品 Infused Items
Infused Items.description: 蓝蝮蛇携带有下列灌注物品：：2瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.jC8GmH0Un6vDxdMj]{高等强酸瓶 Acid Flask (Greater)}，4瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.n5yTlTs63o53n3k6]{高等炽火胶 Alchemist's Fire (Greater)}，6瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Cc4SokzVBoBCkHId]{燃疫松香 Blightburn Resin}，4瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.r2iTRbt1zpkAqHj2]{高等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Greater)}，3份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.87AzvRja9uQOLJCC]{死帽粉 Deathcap Powder}，4瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.mYozcVg9fQY6zO7C]{高等生命灵药 Elixir of Life (Greater)}，2瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.intVPcEzbE9o4NQd]{高等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Greater)}，3份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.76T49dJYfxIrPvQe]{烈赤根糊 Malyass Root Paste}，9份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.iRDCa4OVSTGUD3vi]{紫虫毒 Purple Worm Venom}，6份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Wjkw0lEUOhypYvzo]{阴影精华 Shadow Essence}，3份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.oOXvk18K4izaJzG7]{蛛丝根 Spider Root}。这些物品在24小时内有效，或直到蓝蝮蛇下一次每日准备时有效。

Poisoned Coat.name: 染毒外套 Poisoned Coat
Poisoned Coat.description:
触发 邻接蓝蝮蛇的生物用近战无武装攻击命中他。

效果 触发生物暴露在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.6swrLimere2nZtz9]{龙胆汁 Dragon Bile}效果中。这会消耗这一份毒素，蓝蝮蛇在消耗10 分钟将下一份接触或伤口毒素涂抹到外套前，无法使用此反应动作。

Pinpoint Poisoner.name: 精准下毒 Pinpoint Poisoner
Pinpoint Poisoner.description: 当蓝蝮蛇用涂毒武器对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物打击成功时，和措手不及生物暴露在蓝蝮蛇的吸入毒素时，该生物在对抗该毒素的初次豁免时，豁免获得-2环境减值。

Poison Spray.name: 毒素喷射 Poison Spray
Poison Spray.description:
需求 蓝蝮蛇正手持一份接触或伤口毒素。

效果 蓝蝮蛇口含该毒药，然后用嘴喷出，影响@Template[cone|distance:15]{15尺锥形}范围所有生物。蓝蝮蛇自己不会暴露在该毒素中。范围内所有生物立刻感染该毒素，每个生物都必须进行强韧豁免对抗该毒素。

Quick Application.name: 快速应用 Quick Application
Quick Application.description: 蓝蝮蛇以交互动作抽出一份伤口都要并立刻给持握的一把武器涂毒。

equipment-Shadow Essence (Infused).name: Shadow Essence (Infused)
equipment-Shadow Essence (Infused).description:
Distilled from the Plane of Shadow, this oily substance imposes tenebrous effects. The enfeebled condition from shadow essence lasts for 24 hours.

Activate 2 Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:34]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[void]] damage and @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[3d6[void]] damage, @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[3d6[void]] damage, @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage, and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

equipment-Spider Root (Infused).name: Spider Root (Infused)
equipment-Spider Root (Infused).description:
A paste made by mashing the fine, threadlike roots of a certain creeper vine, spider root renders a victim clumsy and maladroit.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:34]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 6 minutes

Stage 1 @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 minute)

Stage 2 @Damage[9d6[poison]] damage and clumsy 2 (1 minute)

Stage 3 @Damage[10d6[poison]] damage and clumsy 3 (1 minute)

equipment-Shortsword.name: Shortsword
equipment-Shortsword.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

equipment-Acid Flask (Greater) (Infused).name: Acid Flask (Greater) (Infused)
equipment-Acid Flask (Greater) (Infused).description:
Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 3d6 persistent acid damage, and 3 acid splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Alchemist's Fire (Greater) (In.name: Alchemist's Fire (Greater) (Infused)
equipment-Alchemist's Fire (Greater) (In.description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 3d8 fire damage, 3 persistent fire damage, and 3 fire splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Bottled Lightning (Greater) (I.name: Bottled Lightning (Greater) (Infused)
equipment-Bottled Lightning (Greater) (I.description:
Activate A Strike

Bottled lightning is packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they are exposed to air. Bottled lightning deals 3d6 electricity damage and 3 electricity splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Frost Vial (Greater) (Infused).name: Frost Vial (Greater) (Infused)
equipment-Frost Vial (Greater) (Infused).description:
Activate 1 Strike

The liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A frost vial deals the listed cold damage and cold splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. Many types of frost vial also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 3d6 cold damage and 3 cold splash damage, and the target takes a -10-foot penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.nJRoiSyd67eQ1dYj]{Effect: Frost Vial (Greater)}

equipment-Explorer's Clothing.name: Explorer's Clothing
equipment-Explorer's Clothing.description: Adventurers who don't wear armor travel in durable clothing. Though it's not armor and uses your unarmored defense proficiency, it still has a Dex Cap and can grant an item bonus to AC if etched with potency runes.

equipment-Dragon Bile (Applied to Body).name: Dragon Bile (Applied to Body)
equipment-Dragon Bile (Applied to Body).description:
A mix of digestive juices and green dragon poison glands nauseates the victim as its flesh is digested from within.

Infused Items.name: 灌注物品 Infused Items
Infused Items.description: 蓝蝮蛇携带有下列灌注物品：2瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.jC8GmH0Un6vDxdMj]{高等强酸瓶 Acid Flask (Greater)}，4瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.n5yTlTs63o53n3k6]{高等炽火胶 Alchemist's Fire (Greater)}，6瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Cc4SokzVBoBCkHId]{燃疫松香 Blightburn Resin}，4瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.r2iTRbt1zpkAqHj2]{高等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Greater)}，3份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.87AzvRja9uQOLJCC]{死帽粉 Deathcap Powder}，4瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.mYozcVg9fQY6zO7C]{高等生命灵药 Elixir of Life (Greater)}，2瓶@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.intVPcEzbE9o4NQd]{高等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Greater)}，3份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.76T49dJYfxIrPvQe]{烈赤根糊 Malyass Root Paste}，9份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.iRDCa4OVSTGUD3vi]{紫虫毒 Purple Worm Venom}，6份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Wjkw0lEUOhypYvzo]{阴影精华 Shadow Essence}，3份@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.oOXvk18K4izaJzG7]{蛛丝根 Spider Root}。这些物品在24小时内有效，或直到蓝蝮蛇下一次每日准备时有效。

Poisoned Coat.name: 染毒外套 Poisoned Coat
Poisoned Coat.description:
触发 邻接蓝蝮蛇的生物用近战无武装攻击命中他。

效果 触发生物暴露在@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.6swrLimere2nZtz9]{龙胆汁 Dragon Bile}效果中。这会消耗这一份毒素，蓝蝮蛇在消耗10 分钟将下一份接触或伤口毒素涂抹到外套前，无法使用此反应动作。

Pinpoint Poisoner.name: 精准下毒 Pinpoint Poisoner
Pinpoint Poisoner.description: 当蓝蝮蛇用涂毒武器对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物打击成功时，和措手不及生物暴露在蓝蝮蛇的吸入毒素时，该生物在对抗该毒素的初次豁免时，豁免获得-2环境减值。

Poison Spray.name: 毒素喷射 Poison Spray
Poison Spray.description:
需求 蓝蝮蛇正手持一份接触或伤口毒素。

效果 蓝蝮蛇口含该毒药，然后用嘴喷出，影响@Template[cone|distance:15]{15尺锥形}范围所有生物。蓝蝮蛇自己不会暴露在该毒素中。范围内所有生物立刻感染该毒素，每个生物都必须进行强韧豁免对抗该毒素。

Quick Application.name: 快速应用 Quick Application
Quick Application.description: 蓝蝮蛇以交互动作抽出一份伤口都要并立刻给持握的一把武器涂毒。

Toxic Escape.name: 毒烟脱逃 Toxic Escape
Toxic Escape.description: 蓝蝮蛇以交互动作抽出一份吸入毒素，将其散布为一团可以在@Template[emanation|distance:5]{5尺弥漫}范围内提供隐蔽状态的毒烟，然后以最大速度@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneaks}。他不会暴露在吸入毒素的影响下。

equipment-Shortsword.name: Shortsword
equipment-Shortsword.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

equipment-Acid Flask (Greater) (Infused).description:
Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 3d6 persistent acid damage, and 3 acid splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Alchemist's Fire (Greater) (In.name: Alchemist's Fire (Greater) (Infused)
equipment-Alchemist's Fire (Greater) (In.description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 3d8 fire damage, 3 persistent fire damage, and 3 fire splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Bottled Lightning (Greater) (I.name: Bottled Lightning (Greater) (Infused)
equipment-Bottled Lightning (Greater) (I.description:
Activate A Strike

Bottled lightning is packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they are exposed to air. Bottled lightning deals 3d6 electricity damage and 3 electricity splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

equipment-Frost Vial (Greater) (Infused).name: Frost Vial (Greater) (Infused)
equipment-Frost Vial (Greater) (Infused).description:
Activate 1 Strike

The liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A frost vial deals the listed cold damage and cold splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. Many types of frost vial also grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls, the bomb deals 3d6 cold damage and 3 cold splash damage, and the target takes a -10-foot penalty.
