Broken Rebus Attack.name: 破迷障突袭 Broken Rebus Attack
Broken Rebus Attack.disable: @Check[religion|dc:34|name:吟唱义洛里真言|traits:haunt]（专家）吟唱出义洛里真言可让作祟临时安息，@Check[occultism|dc:38|name:制作结界，压制之后的作祟|traits:haunt]（大师）可以制作出结界直接压制之后的作祟。
Broken Rebus Attack.hazarddescription: 幻影袭击者掀翻桌椅，将其甩飞在空中，推搡殴打房间内的生物。
Broken Rebus Attack.reset: 作祟会持续1分钟。它每天会在同一时间自动重置，即早上7点和晚上7点，这个僧人们进行早餐和晚餐的时点。若至少两个人在厨房中制作了一餐饭，并将饭食摆放到食堂中，并在进食前进行义洛里祷告，作祟就能被永久超度不再出现。
Broken Rebus Attack.routine: (1动作)作祟使房间内的物品漫天飞舞。所有身处房间内的生物都会避之不及被砸中，受到@Damage[(3d10+14)[force]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]豁免）。

Ghostly Pull.name: 鬼灵擒拿 Ghostly Pull
Ghostly Pull.description:
触发 有生物进入食堂1轮后

效果 一名破迷障武僧抓住生物咽喉将他拉至食堂正中。触发生物必须进行@Check[fortitude|dc:36|traits:haunt]检定。作祟每轮可以使用该反应动作的次数不限，但对每个试图离开房间的生物每轮最多一次。初次使用该能力后，作祟投掷先攻。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 The 生物被拉进房间10尺。

失败 生物被拉进房间15尺。

大失败 生物被拉进房间15尺，倒地，受到@Damage[2d6[bludgeoning]]伤害。

Butterfly Blade Warrior.name: 蝶刃战士 Butterfly Blade Warrior

Butterfly's Kiss.name: 蝶吻 Butterfly's Kiss
Butterfly's Kiss.description: 蝶刃战士使用蝶刃进行非致命攻击不需要承受相关攻击减值。

Mastermind's Eye.name: 策识眼 Mastermind's Eye
Mastermind's Eye.description: 当蝶刃战士成功通过回忆知识动作检定目标生物时，该生物直到自己的下一回合开始，对蝶刃战士的攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}。若蝶刃战士大成功，该生物在1分钟内对蝶刃战士的攻击措手不及。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 蝶刃战士的打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物额外造成1d6精准伤害。

Studied Strike.name: 策识之击 Studied Strike
Studied Strike.description: 蝶刃战士对目标进行的攻击让他更了解目标。他进行一次近战打击。若命中，他立刻对目标进行一次回忆知识。若攻击大成功，该次回忆知识获得+2环境加值。目标会对策识之击临时免疫1天。

equipment-Butterfly Sword.name: Butterfly Sword
equipment-Butterfly Sword.description: This short, single-edged sword typically features a cross guard that helps catch oncoming attacks. It is the preferred weapon of Butterfly Blades-highly skilled Gokan assassins.

equipment-Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
equipment-Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

Caustic Monitor.name: 酸蚀王蜥 Caustic Monitor
Caustic Monitor.publicNotes:
酸蚀王蜥是原生于民那塔东部的大型蜥蜴，因其粘液、唾液和其他体液中的腐蚀性酶素而熟知并得名。这些腐蚀性液体是作为防护像是巨型蚊子这样大型昆虫的保护手段而演化得来。附着在王蜥鳞片表皮上的厚厚一层粘液使得大多数动物都难以靠近它，更无从捕食。

酸蚀王蜥也会利用他们的腐蚀性生物特性来协助狩猎，具体是喷吐他们胃部腐蚀性物质到猎物上。当然即使他们不使用酸液，酸蚀王蜥依然是致命捕食者：他们使用自己强有力且相对于他们体型和重量而言相当灵巧的前肢抓住较小的生物。

大多数酸蚀王蜥生活在岩石地带，例如卵石滩、天然洞穴和沙质河岸边。酸蚀王蜥的粘液只会腐蚀肉体，所以它的巢穴不会被其损害，但是生活在洞穴附近的腐蚀性植物则是酸蚀王蜥生活于此的醒目信号。勇敢的冒险者和寻宝者必须权衡狩猎野兽的潜在收益——因为它的酸液在炼金术士中具有极高价值——与显而易见的风险。

Caustic Monitor Venom.name: 酸蚀王蜥酸 Caustic Monitor Venom
Caustic Monitor Venom.description:
豁免骰 @Check[fortitude|dc:32]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}（1轮）

阶段2 @Damage[4d6[poison]]伤害和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}（1轮）

Caustic Spray.name: 酸液喷吐 Caustic Spray
Caustic Spray.description: 酸蚀王蜥喷吐酸性胆汁对@Template[cone|distance:20]{20尺锥形区域}造成@Damage[5d8[acid]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic]豁免）。在接下来[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Caustic Spray]]{1d4轮}轮中王蜥不能再次使用酸液喷涂。

Corrosive Flesh.name: 肉体腐蚀 Corrosive Flesh
Corrosive Flesh.description: 任何触碰酸蚀王蜥的生物受到@Damage[2d8[acid]]伤害(@Check[fortitude|dc:32|basic|traits:acid]豁免)。

Gnashing Grip.name: 下颚咬紧 Gnashing Grip
Gnashing Grip.description:
触发 受擒于酸蚀王蜥下颚的生物在逃脱检定失败。

效果 酸蚀王蜥的下颚造成@Damage[2d8[piercing]]伤害并且向触发生物注入酸蚀王蜥毒液。

Lurching Charge.name: 蹒跚冲刺 Lurching Charge
Lurching Charge.description: 酸蚀王蜥行走两次，然后进行一次颚咬打击。如果王蜥从起始点移动至少20尺远，它这次攻击骰具有+2环境加值。

Collapsing Structure.name: 崩塌的建筑 Collapsing Structure
Collapsing Structure.stealthdetails: +20（大师）注意到魔加鲁接近时墙上出现的裂纹。
Collapsing Structure.disable: @Check[athletics|dc:43|name:加固建筑]（大师），@Check[crafting|dc:43|name:加固建筑]（大师），或@Check[engineering-lore|dc:43|name:加固建筑]{工程学识}（大师）加固建筑以减少崩塌风险，直到生物的下回合结束。如果成功，此轮的纯骰检定（详见流程）DC+4，如果大成功则+8。将纯骰检定DC增加到21以上能让建筑稳固，从而结束该危害。
Collapsing Structure.hazarddescription: 魔加鲁撞上一座建筑，严重影响了建筑的稳定性，并可能导致其倒塌。
Collapsing Structure.reset: 建筑在稳固之后的[[/br 1d6]]{1d6轮}之后，会再次受到分崩离析的影响。
Collapsing Structure.routine: （1动作）GM投掷@Check[flat|dc:9]检定来判断建筑是否崩塌，增加DC的情况如上文所述。如果检定成功，建筑内部和周围30尺范围的灰尘和碎片纷纷落下，提供隐蔽，并且对[[/r 1d4]]个随机目标造成@Damage[6d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic]豁免；如果豁免大失败，生物被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}）。如果大成功，效果相同，但是碎片崩落对[[/r 2d4]]个随机目标造成@Damage[12d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic]豁免，如果豁免大失败，生物被碎石掩埋直到被解救，破拆DC38，逃脱DC35）。

Shake Apart.name: 分崩离析 Shake Apart
Shake Apart.description:
触发 魔加鲁对建筑施加力道

效果 建筑开始颤抖。建筑的地板和建筑30尺内的街道变为困难地形；此困难地形中的生物在攻击骰、AC和技能检定上有-2环境减值。危害投掷先攻。

Drake Courser.name: 骑驭龙兽 Drake Courser
Drake Courser.senses: 黑暗视觉，灵敏嗅觉（模糊）30尺，降雪视觉

Snow Vision.name: 降雪视觉 Snow Vision
Snow Vision.description: 雪天不会阻碍霜龙兽的视觉；它会忽略降雪带来的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealment}。

Battle Dance.name: 战舞 Battle Dance
Battle Dance.description: 骑驭龙兽以任意顺序进行两次尖牙打击和一次扫尾打击。它能将任意这些打击替换为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{快步 Step}动作。

Buffeting Surge.name: 冲击爆发 Buffeting Surge
Buffeting Surge.description:
频率 每日3次

效果 骑驭龙兽至多以其速度的2倍进行移动。在此移动中的任意一点，它能尝试用扫尾@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}一次。

Freezing Mist Breath.name: 霜雾吐息 Freezing Mist Breath
Freezing Mist Breath.description: 龙兽吐出一个液体球，对至多60 尺远范围的位置爆发出@Template[burst|distance:20]{半径20尺爆发}区域的霜冻云雾。爆发区域内的生物会承受@Damage[13d6[cold]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:31|basic]豁免）。霜雾会在区域内的所有表面上凝结成一层光滑的冰面，将该区域转化为困难地形，持续[[/br 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4轮}。龙兽在[[/br 1d6 #Recharge Freezing Mist Breath]]{1d6轮}内无法再次使用霜雾吐息。

Ice Climb (35 feet).name: 冰面攀爬35尺
Ice Climb (35 feet).description: 骑驭龙兽能够按照上文中列出的攀爬速度在冰面上攀爬。它忽略由于冰和雪形成的困难地形和高等困难地形，而且它攀爬冰面时不会有坠落的风险。

Reactive Strike (Special)K.name: 反应打击 Reactive Strike (特殊)
Reactive Strike (Special)K.description:
仅限扫尾。如果造成重击，目标被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}；如果目标正在使用移动动作，该动作被打断。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Reactive Strike (Special).description:
Tail only. On a critical hit, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}; if the target was using a move action, its movement ends.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]
Reactive Strike (Special).name: Reactive Strike (Special)

Attack of Opportunity (Special).name: Attack of Opportunity (Special)
Attack of Opportunity (Special).description:
Tail only. On a critical hit, the target is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}; if the target was using a move action, its movement ends.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Dread Roc.name: 恐惧大鹏 Dread Roc
Dread Roc.publicNotes:
大鹏这种传说中体型巨大的猛禽能够捕猎大象，通常从喙到尾巴长约30尺，翼展达80尺以上。它们的狩猎策略是用它们强有力的爪子抓住猎物，然后在进食前从高处将其扔下，再用带钩的喙从骨头上撕下肉来。这种方法会产生大量的腐肉，这会导致一群见机行事食腐动物紧跟在大鹏后面，比如乌鸦和秃鹰，它们很容易就能偷偷啄食残渣。大多数情况下，大鹏并不介意这些生物，它们有时会和死掉的猎物一起被吃掉。

大鹏通常在山顶和崖壁上筑巢，只有最勇敢的陆地居民才能找到其所在。它们捕食的时候会飞很远，在陆地和海洋捕食大型猎物，以维持自己和幼仔的生命。大鹏是孤僻的独行捕食者，会在空中互相激斗以保护领土。大约每十年一次，一对交配的夫妻会一起抚养他们的幼雏。一旦雏鸟长大到可以独立捕食的年龄，父母就会分开，再次单独捕食。

特别有技巧的德鲁伊或游侠可能会捕获并训练大鹏作为飞行坐骑或狩猎伙伴，尽管此等令人难以置信的壮举很难找到几个实例。最简单的方法就是在它刚孵化的那一刻，从幼雏出生时看到的第一个生物的印象开始。然而，获得一枚大鹏的蛋绝非易事，对于想要抢蛋的人来说，这往往意味着给自己判了死刑。

Wing Rebuff.name: 翼返 Wing Rebuff
Wing Rebuff.description:
触发 一个位于大鹏翼击触及范围之外的生物进入大鹏的翼击触及范围。

效果 大鹏对触发生物进行一次翼击打击。如果大鹏推离Push目标，则目标的移动动作被打断。

Dreadful Screech.name: 恐惧尖啸 Dreadful Screech
Dreadful Screech.description:
恐惧大鹏发出令人胆颤的尖啸。@Template[emanation|distance:120]{120尺弥漫}范围内所有生物必须通过@Check[will|dc:32]豁免检定。无论豁免结果如何，生物对该能力获得1分钟临时免疫。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}并且逃跑１轮。

Flying Strafe.name: 飞掠 Flying Strafe
Flying Strafe.description: 大鹏以它的飞行速度飞行，并在这一行动中的任何时刻进行两次爪击打击。每次打击必须针对不同的生物。每次攻击正常计算多重攻击减值。

Snack.name: 小菜 Snack
Snack.description: 大鹏攻击被自己脚爪@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的生物时在攻击检定上获得+2环境加值。

Snatch.name: 抓握 Snatch
Snatch.description: 大鹏用一只或两只脚爪@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}一个生物的时候能以一半的速度飞行，并带着目标一起移动。

Improved Push 15ft.description:
Requirements The monster's last action was a success with a Strike that lists Push in its damage entry.

Effect The monster automatically knocks the target away from the monster. Unless otherwise noted in the ability description, the creature is pushed 15 feet. If the attack was a critical hit, this distance is doubled.
Improved Push 15ft.name: Improved Push 15ft

Dromornis.name: 奔鸟 Dromornis
Dromornis.publicNotes:
奔鸟是一种大型、无法飞行、食肉鸟类，其一般群体行动四处捕获猎物。他们短小、粗壮的翅膀让他们看起来滑稽可笑，但是任何被其强有力的喙啄过的人都知道这一点也不可笑。奔鸟用喙从猎物的骨骼上轻而易举的撕扯下肌肉和筋腱，快速分食任意大小的哺乳类动物，像是鹿、貘或者灵长动物。已知特别饥饿或攻击性的奔鸟会攻击类人生物。这种鸟的强壮大腿所带动的锐利脚爪相比较其喙在战斗中略显次要，然而其依然可以践踏并撕碎脚底下，像是啮齿或两栖类的小型生物。

单独一只奔鸟已经足够危险，一群奔鸟可以袭掠一个熊类巢穴或类人生物村庄。奔鸟族群一般会有三或四个成鸟和至多五个幼鸟，他们会前后夹击以狩猎那些较大的猎物。奔鸟族群会蹲守像是蟒蛇、野猪、水牛，在不得已时甚至是恐龙作为猎物，然后集体出动进行突袭。奔鸟并不太聪明，但是已知他们会使用巧妙（亦或危险）的诱饵战术——将自己的雏鸟置于危险之中来引诱大量的猎物。

奔鸟大多数时候生活在远离文明社会的热带雨林中，但是他们经常定居于山洞或者岩石群海岸线旁。旁观者很难区分一只只奔鸟，但奔鸟通过信息素和气味腺来维系着紧密的家族结构，所以显而易见会有自于其他家族的流浪者试图侵犯一个奔鸟族群巢穴。这种对居住地的争夺很常见；一个特别珍贵的奔鸟巢穴可能在一年中几经易手。奔鸟族群之间的战斗通常混乱而且迅捷，伴随着恐怖的鸣叫和四溅的鲜血。

Pack Ambush.name: 集群伏击 Pack Ambush
Pack Ambush.description:
触发 在10尺内的另一只奔鸟行走。

效果 奔鸟行走至多一半速度的距离。

Pack Attack.name: 集群攻击 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description: 当周围有同伴时奔鸟才能全力战斗。当触及范围内有至少两只奔鸟同伴时，奔鸟对任意生物造成额外1d8伤害。

Rushing Attack.name: 冲刺攻击 Rushing Attack
Rushing Attack.description: 奔鸟突然行走并在结束移动后进行一次打击。这次行走，它速度获得+10尺环境加值。

Elder Cauthooj.name: 老年迷音鸟 Elder Cauthooj
Elder Cauthooj.publicNotes:
这些巨大的、不会飞的鸟类虽然身体高长、步态滑稽，但其实出人意料的灵活。他们是独行的掠食者，用他们具有迷惑性的鸟鸣让猎物陷入疯狂，操纵他们互相攻击，这样它们就能尽情享用它们的遗骸了。

一些学者将它们成为“人偶师鸟”，另一些人则称其为“尖叫伯劳”。迷音鸟为大多数聪明的类人生物所唾骂，部分原因是因为这些鸟更喜欢狩猎类人生物。当地人目击到迷音鸟之后通常会组织一个捕猎队，在它再次杀戮之前追踪他的行踪，猎人们通常会把耳朵塞满蜡，以免被它的叫声所影响。那些有幸从这种叫声中幸存下来的人表示，这种声音特别让人紧张不安，甚至没有什么声音比它更为可怕。

虽然人们可能会认为迷音鸟是一种愚蠢的动物，但这些生物实际上比它们看起来要聪明的多。迷音鸟会在偏远的定居点外围跟踪孤独的旅行者，以让自己能饱餐一顿。这些有耐心的生物直到填饱肚子之前能一直埋伏很久。他们甚至能理解一些基本的木族语，尽管它们无法清晰地说话，但这不能阻止迷音鸟试图模仿它听到的声音，当它这么做的时候，它的野蛮的原始天性增强了这种行为，这让它拥有了能控制思维并造成混乱的能力，迷音鸟的智力让它足以理解自身这种特性，并乐在其中。

Thoughtsense (Imprecise) 60ft.name: 思维感知（模糊）60尺
Thoughtsense (Imprecise) 60ft.description: 迷音鸟能感受到距离内的生物思维。

Hop-Dodge.name: 跳跃闪避 Hop-Dodge
Hop-Dodge.description:
触发 迷音鸟是近战打击的目标，且与另一个同样位于该近战打击触及范围内的敌人相邻。

效果 迷音鸟敏捷地跳跃，使得触发此能力的近战打击的目标变成与迷音鸟相邻的敌人。迷音鸟以半速行走，并且此移动不触发任何反应动作。

Staccato Strike.name: 颤音打击 Staccato Strike
Staccato Strike.description: 迷音鸟通过微妙声调变化，可以指挥一个因为颤音之歌而@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}的生物进行一次打击。这参照一般陷入困惑的生物进行的打击，只是迷音鸟可以指定打击的目标。如果目标的触及范围内没有目标，或目标因为其他原因无法进行打击，则此能力无效。

Warbling Song.name: 颤音之歌 Warbling Song
Warbling Song.description:
迷音鸟发出一种奇怪的悲泣，导致附近的生物变得狂躁和失控。@Template[emanation|distance:120]{120尺弥散}范围内的所有生物都必须进行@Check[will|dc:34]豁免来抵抗该效果。

大成功 目标不受影响且临时免疫该能力一分钟。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}1轮。

大失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}1轮并立即攻击目标自己（采用困惑状态时通常的攻击方式）。这次攻击并不能让目标因为受伤而尝试用纯骰检定来从混乱状态恢复。

Thoughtsense (Imprecise) 60 feet.name: Thoughtsense (Imprecise) 60 feet
Thoughtsense (Imprecise) 60 feet.description: The cauthooj senses a creatures mental essence at the listed ranged.

Floating Flamethrower.name: 浮动喷火器 Floating Flamethrower
Floating Flamethrower.stealthdetails: +23（专家）或@Check[perception|dc:38|traits:action:seek]（大师）骷髅的运行轨迹
Floating Flamethrower.disable: 三次@Check[thievery|dc:40|name:Disable an Elemental Core|traits:action:disable-a-device,hazard,magical,trap,fire]（传奇）；或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（7环；反制DC 40），每次成功都能抽出或解除一个隐藏在烈焰骷髅内的元素核心：分别位于左眼、右眼和嘴部。
Floating Flamethrower.hazarddescription: 一个漂浮的烈焰骷髅在竞技场以环形轨道周围盘旋，向随机方向喷出烈焰。
Floating Flamethrower.routine: （3 动作）每成功解除一次，陷阱就损失一个动作。浮动喷火器使用第一个动作喷出@Template[cone|distance:15]{15尺锥形}火焰，造成@Damage[(4d6+4)[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic]豁免），它的第二个动作是进行一次U形随机方向的飞行，它的第三个动作是再次喷出烈焰。

Blaze.name: 烈焰 Blaze
Blaze.description:
触发 郝金发出比赛开始的信号

效果 陷阱喷出火焰，投掷先攻。

Freezing Floor Tiles.name: 寒冰地砖 Freezing Floor Tiles
Freezing Floor Tiles.stealthdetails: +23（专家）或@Check[perception|dc:38|traits:action:seek]（大师）注意到四个传感器
Freezing Floor Tiles.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:40|name:Disable One Sensor|traits:action:disable-a-device] (传奇)或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (6环；反制DC38)来解除其中一个传感器
Freezing Floor Tiles.hazarddescription: 在竞技场的每个角落有4个传感器，可以从竞技场的随机地板上中释放冰冻魔法，阻止生物前进。
Freezing Floor Tiles.routine: （4 动作）每成功解除一个传感器，陷阱就损失一个动作。在每个动作中，陷阱会随机让10尺见方的竞技场地砖变为寒冰。寒冰区域内的每个生物开始回合时都会受到@Damage[(2d6+2)[cold]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:40|basic]豁免）。豁免大失败的生物还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续1轮；如果它已经陷入缓慢，生物则被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 轮。任意数量的火焰伤害都可以移除生物的缓慢或禁足状态。在陷阱的下个回合开始时，寒冰地板会解冻。

Frigid Floor.name: 寒冰地板 Frigid Floor
Frigid Floor.description:
触发 郝金发出比赛开始的信号

效果 陷阱投掷先攻。

Site Bound.name: 束缚之地 Site Bound
Site Bound.description: 典型的灵魂通常只能距离在他被杀死或作祟的地点很近的区域逗留。这个限制一般为120尺远。部分幽灵会被限制在对他来说具有特殊意义的房间、建筑、物品或生物上，而非具体的某个地点。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
让区域A8的主持安息可以超度这些鬼灵武僧，他们的灵魂将回归轴心城的静修结社。

当幽灵被摧毁时，他会在[[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4天}后在被束缚的地点重新生成，生命值全满。只有在有人确定了幽灵存在的成因并纠正任何阻止幽灵安息的因素时，幽灵才能被永久摧毁。

Frightful Moan.name: 骇人悲叹 Frightful Moan
Frightful Moan.description: 幽灵为自身的命运而哀悼，迫使@Template[emanation|distance:30]{30尺}内的每个活物尝试一次@Check[will|dc:25]豁免。豁免失败时，该生物会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}（大失败则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}）。豁免成功时，该生物会在1分钟内临时免疫幽灵的骇人悲叹。

Telekinetic Assault.name: 念力袭击 Telekinetic Assault
Telekinetic Assault.description: 幽灵痛苦地尖啸并使得小物体和物体碎片在@Template[emanation|distance:30]{30尺弥漫}区域内迸发飞溅。此区域内的生物会受到@Damage[5d6[bludgeoning]]伤害 + 每2个等级1d6点钝击伤害，此能力受@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic]豁免影响。

Flurry of Blows.name: Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: The ghost monk makes two Strikes with their ghostly fist. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

Golarion's Finest (Brartork).name: 布拉托克(格拉里昂最强队) Golarion's Finest (Brartork)

Knocking Sweep.name: 秋风扫落叶 Knocking Sweep
Knocking Sweep.description: 布拉托克挥舞武器旋转起来。对触及内任意数量的生物分别进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}的运动检定。每次摔绊尝试都会增加多次攻击减值，但在所有摔绊检定结算前不会计入。

Powerful Fists.name: 强力拳 Powerful Fists
Powerful Fists.description: 布拉托克的拳头打击视为寒铁和银，且在造成致命伤时不会受到非致命的攻击减值。

Punch Down.name: 倒地追击 Punch Down
Punch Down.description: 布拉托克攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}状态的敌人会额外造成2d10伤害。

Hurling Toss.name: 回旋投掷 Hurling Toss
Hurling Toss.description:
需求 布拉托克正擒抱或束缚着一个生物。

效果 布拉托克进行一次@Check[athletics|defense:fortitude]检定对抗该生物的强韧DC。

大成功 将该生物投出25尺远，造成@Damage[2d8[bludgeoning]]伤害，该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

成功 如同大成功，只是该生物不倒地。

失败 投掷失败。

大失败 不仅投掷失败，该生物还不再被布拉托克擒抱或束缚。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: 布拉托克进行两次无武装打击。若两次命中同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。

Abundant Step.name: Abundant Step
Abundant Step.description: You move so fast you blur across planar boundaries. You teleport up to a distance equal to your Speed within your line of sight.

Ki Blast.name: Ki Blast
Ki Blast.description:
You unleash your ki as a powerful blast of force that deals 2d6 force damage.

If you use 2 actions to cast ki blast, increase the size of the cone to 30 feet and the damage to @Damage[3d6[force]].

If you use 3 actions to cast ki blast, increase the size of the cone to 60 feet and the damage to @Damage[4d6[force]].

Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is pushed 5 feet.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is pushed 10 feet.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or by [[/r 2d6]] if you use 2 or 3 actions.

Ki Rush.name: Ki Rush
Ki Rush.description:
Accelerated by your ki, you move with such speed you become a blur. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order).

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition during this movement and until the start of your next turn.

Wholeness of Body.name: Wholeness of Body
Wholeness of Body.description:
You heal yourself in one of the following ways, chosen by you when you cast the spell.

  • You regain 8 Hit Points.
  • You attempt to cure one poison or disease afflicting you; attempt to counteract the affliction.

Heightened (+1) If you choose to regain Hit Points, the Hit Points regained increase by 8.

Wind Jump.name: Wind Jump
Wind Jump.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall.

Heightened (6th) At the end of your turn, you can attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:30] check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5MI2c9IgxfSeGZQo]{Spell Effect: Wind Jump}

Ki Strike.name: Ki Strike
Ki Strike.description:
You focus your ki into magical attacks. Make an unarmed Strike or Flurry of Blows (this doesn't change the limit on using only one flourish per turn).

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with the Strikes, and the Strikes deal 1d6 extra damage. This damage can be any of the following types of your choice, chosen each time you Strike: force, lawful (only if you're lawful), negative, or positive.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8olfnTmWh0GGPDqX]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike}

Heightened (+4) The extra damage increases by 1d6.

equipment-Bo Staff.name: Bo Staff
equipment-Bo Staff.description: This strong but slender staff is tapered at the ends and well balanced. It's designed to be an offensive and defensive weapon.

equipment-Dart.name: Dart
equipment-Dart.description: This thrown weapon is larger than an arrow but shorter than a javelin. It typically has a short shaft of wood ending in a metal tip and is sometimes stabilized by feathers or fur.

equipment-+1 Striking Handwraps of Might.description:
As you invest these embroidered strips of cloth, you must meditate and slowly wrap them around your hands. These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.
equipment-+1 Striking Handwraps of Might.name: +1 Striking Handwraps of Mighty Blows

equipment-Bracers of Armor I.name: Bracers of Armor I
equipment-Bracers of Armor I.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

prototypeToken.name: 布拉托克(格拉里昂最强队)

Golarion's Finest (Han).name: 韩(格拉里昂最强队) Golarion's Finest (Han)

Powerful Uppercut.name: 猛力上勾拳 Powerful Uppercut
Powerful Uppercut.description:
韩打出一记充满杀伤力的上勾拳。他进行一次无武装打击。若命中，额外造成@Damage[1d10[bludgeoning]]伤害并且目标必须进行@Check[fortitude|dc:28]豁免检定。无论结果如何，韩获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

成功 没有效果。

失败 目标被击破平衡，直到目标下一回合结束为止，目标的所有攻击获得-1 环境减值。

大失败 如同失败，目标还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

equipment-Bracers of Armor I.name: Bracers of Armor I
equipment-Bracers of Armor I.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

prototypeToken.name: 库拉克丝(格拉里昂最强队)

Golarion's Finest (Mingyu).name: 明玉(格拉里昂最强队) Golarion's Finest (Mingyu)

Knocking Sweep.name: 秋风扫落叶 Knocking Sweep
Knocking Sweep.description: 明玉挥舞武器旋转起来。对触及内任意数量的生物分别进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}的运动检定。每次摔绊尝试都会增加多次攻击减值，但在所有摔绊检定结算前不会计入。

Powerful Fists.name: 强力拳 Powerful Fists
Powerful Fists.description: 明玉的拳头打击视为寒铁和银，且在造成致命伤时不会受到非致命的攻击减值。

Punch Down.name: 倒地追击 Punch Down
Punch Down.description: 明玉攻击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}状态的敌人会额外造成2d10伤害。

Flying Kicks.name: 飞踢 Flying Kicks
Flying Kicks.description: 明玉高高跳起，飞踢沿途敌人。明玉进行一次行走然后在移动中进行至多三次打击，每次打击目标为触及内一个不同的敌人。这些攻击都会计算多次攻击减值的次数，但在飞踢的打击全部进行完之前不会计入。随后明玉获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: 明玉进行两次无武装打击。若两次命中同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。

Abundant Step.name: Abundant Step
Abundant Step.description: You move so fast you blur across planar boundaries. You teleport up to a distance equal to your Speed within your line of sight.

Ki Blast.name: Ki Blast
Ki Blast.description:
You unleash your ki as a powerful blast of force that deals 2d6 force damage.

If you use 2 actions to cast ki blast, increase the size of the cone to 30 feet and the damage to @Damage[3d6[force]].

If you use 3 actions to cast ki blast, increase the size of the cone to 60 feet and the damage to @Damage[4d6[force]].

Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is pushed 5 feet.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is pushed 10 feet.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or by [[/r 2d6]] if you use 2 or 3 actions.

Ki Rush.name: Ki Rush
Ki Rush.description:
Accelerated by your ki, you move with such speed you become a blur. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order).

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition during this movement and until the start of your next turn.

Wholeness of Body.name: Wholeness of Body
Wholeness of Body.description:
You heal yourself in one of the following ways, chosen by you when you cast the spell.

  • You regain 8 Hit Points.
  • You attempt to cure one poison or disease afflicting you; attempt to counteract the affliction.

Heightened (+1) If you choose to regain Hit Points, the Hit Points regained increase by 8.

Wind Jump.name: Wind Jump
Wind Jump.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. You must end your turn on solid ground, or you fall.

Heightened (6th) At the end of your turn, you can attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:30|name:Find Purchase in Midair] check to find purchase in midair. If you succeed, you don't fall.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.5MI2c9IgxfSeGZQo]{Spell Effect: Wind Jump}

Ki Strike.name: Ki Strike
Ki Strike.description:
You focus your ki into magical attacks. Make an unarmed Strike or Flurry of Blows (this doesn't change the limit on using only one flourish per turn).

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with the Strikes, and the Strikes deal 1d6 extra damage. This damage can be any of the following types of your choice, chosen each time you Strike: force, lawful (only if you're lawful), negative, or positive.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.8olfnTmWh0GGPDqX]{Spell Effect: Ki Strike}

Heightened (+4) The extra damage increases by 1d6.

equipment-Bo Staff.name: Bo Staff
equipment-Bo Staff.description: This strong but slender staff is tapered at the ends and well balanced. It's designed to be an offensive and defensive weapon.

equipment-Dart.name: Dart
equipment-Dart.description: This thrown weapon is larger than an arrow but shorter than a javelin. It typically has a short shaft of wood ending in a metal tip and is sometimes stabilized by feathers or fur.

equipment-+1 Striking Handwraps of Might.name: +1 Striking Handwraps of Mighty Blows
equipment-+1 Striking Handwraps of Might.description:

These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

equipment-Bracers of Armor I.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

Flip Kick.name: 翻身踢 Flip Kick
Flip Kick.description: 路莫里兹进行一次翻身跳跃然后出腿踢向对方。路莫里兹向任意方向跳跃5尺远5尺高。在跳跃过程中任一时刻对一个触及内生物进行一次打击。随后他会安全降落到地面上。

Palm Flurry.name: 疾风掌 Palm Flurry
Palm Flurry.description: 保宁玛打出重重掌影，进行手掌打击，对所有邻接的生物造成@Damage[1d8[bludgeoning]]伤害。每多用1个动作使用疾风掌，伤害就增加1d8(@Damage[2d8[bludgeoning]]{2动作伤害}, @Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]]{3动作伤害})。无论用多少个动作，目标都可以进行@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic]豁免。

For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

prototypeToken.name: 拉贾娜(格拉里昂最强队)

Gomwai.name: 工崴 Gomwai
Gomwai.blurb: 男性大地精武道会执行者

Powerful Fists.name: 强力拳 Powerful Fists
Powerful Fists.description: 工崴的拳头打击视为寒铁和银，且在造成致命伤时不会受到非致命的攻击减值。

Stunning Fist.name: 震慑拳 Stunning Fist
Stunning Fist.description: 连击集中力道更能盖过敌人。当工崴@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.nbfNETdpee8CVM17]{疾风连击 Flurry of Blows}两次打击选择同一生物为目标后，可以尝试震慑它。若疾风连击中有打击命中且造成了伤害，目标必须进行一次@Check[fortitude|dc:30]豁免检定，失败会获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}（若大失败则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}）。这是一个失能效果。

Flurry of Blows.name: 疾风连击 Flurry of Blows
Flurry of Blows.description: 工崴进行两次无武装打击。若两次命中同一个生物，计算抗力和弱点时将伤害合计。

Flurry of Maneuvers.name: 疾风战技 Flurry of Maneuvers
Flurry of Maneuvers.description: 工崴在进行疾风连击时，能用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒抱 Grapples}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shoves}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trips}替代其中一次或多次打击。

equipment-+1 Striking Handwraps of Might.name: +1 Striking Handwraps of Mighty Blows
equipment-+1 Striking Handwraps of Might.description:
As you invest these embroidered strips of cloth, you must meditate and slowly wrap them around your hands. These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

equipment-Bracers of Armor I.name: Bracers of Armor I
equipment-Bracers of Armor I.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

Mantis Ambush.name: 螳螂伏击 Mantis Ambush
Mantis Ambush.description:
触发 一个在螳螂爷爷触及范围内的敌人被盟友的近战打击命中

效果 螳螂爷爷对触发的生物进行一次爪抓打击。

Shadow Blast.name: Shadow Blast
Shadow Blast.description:
You shape the quasi-real substance of the Shadow Plane into a blast. Choose acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, force, piercing, slashing, or sonic damage, and choose a 30-foot cone, a 15-foot burst within 120 feet, or a 50-foot line. The blast deals 5d8 damage of the type you chose to each creature in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Heightened (7th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Grave Spinosaurus.name: 死墓棘龙 Grave Spinosaurus
Grave Spinosaurus.publicNotes:
棘龙不仅是最大的食肉恐龙之一，它也是外表最不寻常的一种，它的脊背上长着巨大的帆状鳍。这种帆通常鲜艳多彩，它可以帮助棘龙吸引异性，能帮助它游泳，也能让它看起来比实际更为巨大。游泳的棘龙也可以用它的船帆作为一种独特的攻击手段，用它拍打水面，制造出毁灭性的波浪，使猎物惊愕。

棘龙既能在水中生存，也能在陆地上生存，它长长的长着无数牙齿的喉咙非常适合捕捉游泳的猎物。巨人们捕捉棘龙作为守护者的尝试通常都以失败告终，因为这些顽固的恐龙不能很好地驯服。他们粗暴的态度和引人注目的外表使他们更适合进行血腥的运动，这让它们深受那些专门从事让角斗士与饥饿的动物或野兽战斗的人的欢迎。当然，如果一只愤怒的棘龙被迫为了取悦他人而战斗，那么对它来说无论是竞技场里的还是看台上的人都将沦为它的食物。

长久以来，那些热衷将动物变成魔法守护者的施法者们一直被棘龙的潜能所吸引。棘龙所经受过的塑肉仪式、怪物杂交或其他魔法改造恐怕比任何其他恐龙都要多，这些尝试都是为了提高它们作为守护者的战斗力。

棘龙可以长达60尺，重25000磅。

Deep Breath.name: 深呼吸 Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description: 死墓棘龙可以屏住呼吸4小时。

Pouncing Pin.name: 猛扑压制 Pouncing Pin
Pouncing Pin.description: 死墓棘龙行走，然后在移动结束时进行一次打击。若打击命中，正常造成伤害，并且死墓棘龙一次运动检定对目标进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}。这次摔绊会正常视为攻击来增加死墓棘龙的多次攻击减值，但在本行动的打击和运动检定结束前不会计算。

Rip and Tear.name: 横冲直撞 Rip and Tear
Rip and Tear.description:
需求 死墓棘龙正啃咬@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}住一个生物。

效果 死墓棘龙伸长脖子，对啃咬擒抱住的生物大力撕扯，对其造成@Damage[6d10[slashing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:36|basic]豁免）和@Damage[2d6[bleed]]伤害。

Staggering Sail.name: 巨浪翻腾 Staggering Sail
Staggering Sail.description:
需求 死墓棘龙正在水面游泳

效果 伴随海浪一阵猛冲，死墓棘龙用肢体猛击水面，形成一波巨浪，对@Template[cone|distance:30]{30尺锥形}范围内所有生物造成@Damage[8d6[bludgeoning]]伤害。每个范围内的生物必须进行@Check[reflex|dc:36|traits:damaging-effect]豁免检定。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物受到伤害减半。

失败 生物受到全额伤害且直到下回合结束前获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

大失败 生物受到双倍伤害且获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}。

Halspin the Stung.name: 哈尔斯丁·刺痛 Halspin the Stung

Cat's Luck.name: 猫之幸运 Cat's Luck
Cat's Luck.description:
频率 每日一次

触发 哈尔斯丁反射豁免失败或大失败

哈尔斯丁重新投掷反射豁免，并使用较好的结果。

Scintillating Pattern.description:
A field of cascading, ever-changing colors manifests in the air. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} while inside the pattern, as are those within 20 feet of the pattern's area. A creature must attempt a Will save if it is inside the pattern when you cast it, enters the pattern, ends its turn within the pattern, or uses a Seek or Interact action on the pattern. A creature currently affected by the pattern doesn't need to attempt new saves.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. After the Stunned condition ends, the creature is Confused for the remaining duration of the spell.
Scintillating Pattern.name: Scintillating Pattern

Uncontrollable Dance.description:
The target is overcome with an all-consuming urge to dance. For the duration of the spell, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and can't use reactions. While affected, the creature can't use actions with the move trait except to dance, using the Stride action to move up to half its Speed.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The spell's duration is 3 rounds, and the target must spend at least 1 action each turn dancing.

Failure The spell's duration is 1 minute, and the target must spend at least 2 actions each turn dancing.

Critical Failure The spell's duration is 1 minute, and the target must spend all its actions each turn dancing.
Uncontrollable Dance.name: Uncontrollable Dance

Allegro.description: You perform rapidly, speeding up your ally. The ally becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} and can use the additional action to Strike, Stride, or Step.
Allegro.name: Allegro

Dimensional Lock.name: Dimensional Lock
Dimensional Lock.description: You create a shimmering barrier that attempts to counteract teleportation effects and planar travel into or out of the area, including items that allow access to extradimensional spaces (such as a bag of holding). Dimensional lock tries to counteract any attempt to summon a creature into the area but doesn't stop the creature from departing when the summoning ends.

Energy Aegis.name: Energy Aegis
Energy Aegis.description:
You protect the target with a powerful, long-lasting energy barrier. The target gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, and void damage.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.4Lo2qb5PmavSsLNk]{Spell Effect: Energy Aegis}

Heightened (9th) The resistances increase to 10.

Prismatic Spray.name: Prismatic Spray
Prismatic Spray.description:
A spray of rainbow light beams cascades from your open hand. Each creature in the area must roll 1d8 on the table below to see which beam affects it, then attempt a saving throw of the indicated type. The table notes any additional traits that apply to each type of ray. If a creature is struck by multiple beams, it uses the same d20 result for all its saving throws. For all rays, a successful saving throw negates the effect for that creature.

Prismatic Spray

1d8 Color Save Effects (Traits)
1 Red Reflex 50 fire damage (fire)
2 Orange Reflex 60 acid damage (acid)
3 Yellow Reflex 70 electricity damage (electricity)
4 Green Fortitude 30 poison damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute (poison)
5 Blue Fortitude Affected as if by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{Petrify}
6 Indigo Will Confused, as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8kJbiBEjMWG4VUjs]{Warp Mind} spell (mental)
7 Violet Will Slowed for 1 minute; if a critical failure, sent to another plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Interplanar Teleport} (teleportation)
8 Potent beam - Affected by two beams - roll twice, rerolling any duplicates or results of 8

Soothing Ballad.description:
You draw upon your muse to soothe your allies. Choose one of the following three effects:

  • The spell attempts to counteract fear effects on the targets.
  • The spell attempts to counteract effects imposing paralysis on the targets.
  • The spell restores 7d8 Hit Points to the targets.

Heightened (+1) When used to heal, soothing ballad restores 1d8 more Hit Points.
Soothing Ballad.name: Soothing Ballad

Collective Transposition.description:
You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target can teleport if it wants, but it chooses the destination within range.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure You teleport the target and choose its destination.

Heightened (+1) The number of targets increases by 1.
Collective Transposition.name: Collective Transposition

Phantasmal Calamity.name: Phantasmal Calamity
Phantasmal Calamity.description:
A vision of apocalyptic destruction fills the mind of each creature in the area. The vision deals 11d6 mental damage (basic Will save). On a critical failure, the creature must also succeed at a Reflex save or believe it's trapped (stuck in a fissure, adrift at sea, or some other fate in keeping with its vision). If it fails the second save, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new Will save at the end of each of its turns, and on a success, it disbelieves the illusion and recovers from the Stunned condition.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Vampiric Exsanguination.description:
You draw in the blood and life force of other creatures through your outstretched arms. You deal 12d6 void damage to living creatures in the area. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the damage a single creature takes from this spell; calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
Vampiric Exsanguination.name: Vampiric Exsanguination

Cloak of Colors.description:
A cloak of swirling colors shrouds the target. Creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} while adjacent to it, and attacking the target causes a brilliant flash of light. A creature that hits the target with a melee attack must attempt a Will save.The creature is temporarily immune until the end of its turn; this effect has the incapacitation trait.

Success The attacker is unaffected.

Failure The attacker is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The attacker is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.
Cloak of Colors.name: Cloak of Colors

Shadow Blast.name: Shadow Blast
Shadow Blast.description:
You shape the quasi-real substance of the Shadow Plane into a blast. Choose acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, force, piercing, slashing, or sonic damage, and choose a 30-foot cone, a 15-foot burst within 120 feet, or a 50-foot line. The blast deals 5d8 damage of the type you chose to each creature in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Shadow Siphon.description:
Trigger A spell or magical effect deals damage.

Exchanging material energy with that of the Shadow Plane, you transform the triggering spell into a partially illusory version of itself. Attempt to counteract the target spell. If the attempt is successful, any creatures that would be damaged by the spell instead take only half as much damage, but the spell otherwise works as normal. Treat shadow siphon's counteract rank as 2 higher for this attempt.
Shadow Siphon.name: Shadow Siphon

Blink.name: Blink
Blink.description:
You blink quickly between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane. You gain resistance 5 to all damage (except force). You can Sustain the Spell to vanish and reappear 10 feet away in a random direction determined by the GM; the movement doesn't trigger reactions. At the end of your turn, you vanish and reappear as above.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ZlsuhS9J0S3PuvCO]{Spell Effect: Blink}

Heightened (+2) The resistance increases by 3.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Fly.description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Heightened (7th) The duration increases to 1 hour.
Fly.name: Fly

Inspire Heroics.description:
You call upon your muse to greatly increase the benefits you provide with your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{Courageous Anthem} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{Rallying Anthem} composition. If your next action is to cast inspire courage or inspire defense, attempt a Performance check. The DC is usually a very hard DC of a level equal to that of the highest-level target of your composition, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect of your inspire courage or inspire defense composition depends on the result of your check.

Critical Success The status bonus from your inspire courage or inspire defense increases to +3.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.VFereWC1agrwgzPL]{Critical Success on Inspire Courage}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.BKam63zT98iWMJH7]{Critical Success on Inspire Defense}

Success The status bonus from inspire courage or inspire defense increases to +2.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.kZ39XWJA3RBDTnqG]{Success on Inspire Courage}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Chol7ExtoN2T36mP]{Success on Inspire Defense}

Failure Your inspire courage or inspire defense provides only its normal bonus of +1, but you don't spend the Focus Point for casting this spell.
Inspire Heroics.name: Inspire Heroics

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description:
Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 6 creatures.

Invisibility Sphere.description:
You and all targets are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} except to each other as long as you remain within the spell's area. If a creature made invisible by this spell leaves the spell's area, it becomes visible and remains so even if it returns to the spell's area. If any creature made invisible by this spell uses a hostile action, the spell ends after the hostile action is completed.

While exploring, it's easy to move together slowly and remain invisible. This is untenable in a battle, however. Once an encounter begins, creatures remain invisible until at most the end of the first round, at which point the spell ends.

Heightened (5th) The duration increases to 1 hour.
Invisibility Sphere.name: Invisibility Sphere

Slow.description:
You dilate the flow of time around the target, slowing its actions.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} for 1 minute.

Heightened (6th) You can target up to 10 creatures.
Slow.name: Slow

Dispel Magic.name: Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you successfully counteract a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.

Resist Energy.name: Resist Energy
Resist Energy.description:
A shield of elemental energy protects a creature against one type of energy damage. Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. The target and its gear gain resistance 5 against the damage type you chose.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.con2Hzt47JjpuUej]{Spell Effect: Resist Energy}

Heightened (4th) The resistance increases to 10, and you can target up to two creatures.

Heightened (7th) The resistance increases to 15, and you can target up to five creatures.

Counter Performance.description:
Trigger You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an auditory or visual effect.

Your performance protects you and your allies. Roll a Performance check for a type you know: an auditory performance if the trigger was auditory, or a visual one for a visual trigger. You and allies in the area can use the better result between your Performance check and the saving throw.
Counter Performance.name: Counter Performance

Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).
Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic

Forbidding Ward.description:
You ward an ally against the attacks and hostile spells from the target enemy. The target ally gains a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ctMxYPGEpstvhW9C]{Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward}

Heightened (6th) The status bonus increases to +2.
Forbidding Ward.name: Forbidding Ward

Guidance.description:
You ask for divine guidance, granting the target a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check the target attempts before the duration ends. The target chooses which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If the target uses the bonus, the spell ends. Either way, the target is then temporarily immune for 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3qHKBDF7lrHw8jFK]{Spell Effect: Guidance}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3LyOkV25p7wA181H]{Effect: Guidance Immunity}
Guidance.name: Guidance

Inspire Courage.name: Inspire Courage
Inspire Courage.description:
You inspire yourself and your allies with words or tunes of encouragement. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.beReeFroAx24hj83]{Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem}

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

Message.description:
You mouth words quietly, but instead of coming out of your mouth, they're transferred directly to the ears of the target. While others can't hear your words any better than if you normally mouthed them, the target can hear your words as if they were standing next to you.

The target can give a brief response as a reaction, or as a free action on their next turn if they wish, but they must be able to see you and be within range to do so. If they respond, their response is delivered directly to your ear, just like the original message.

Heightened (3rd) The spell's range increases to 500 feet.
Message.name: Message

Sanctuary.description:
You ward a creature with protective energy that deters enemy attacks. Creatures attempting to attack the target must attempt a Will save each time. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends.

Critical Success Sanctuary ends.

Success The creature can attempt its attack and any other attacks against the target this turn.

Failure The creature can't attack the target and wastes the action. It can't attempt further attacks against the target this turn.

Critical Failure The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack the target for the rest of sanctuary's duration.
Sanctuary.name: Sanctuary

Spirit Link.name: Spirit Link
Spirit Link.description:
You form a spiritual link with another creature, taking in its pain. When you Cast this Spell and at the start of each of your turns, if the target is below maximum Hit Points, it regains 2 Hit Points (or the difference between its current and maximum Hit Points, if that's lower). You lose as many Hit Points as the target regained.

This is a spiritual transfer, so no effects apply that would increase the Hit Points the target regains or decrease the Hit Points you lose. This transfer also ignores any temporary Hit Points you or the target have. Since this effect doesn't involve vitality or void energy, spirit link works even if you or the target is undead. While the duration persists, you gain no benefit from regeneration or fast healing. You can Dismiss this spell, and if you're ever at 0 Hit Points, spirit link ends automatically.

Heightened (+1) The number of Hit Points transferred each time increases by 2.

True Strike.description:
A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fpGDAz2v5PG0zUSl]{Spell Effect: Sure Strike}
True Strike.name: True Strike

equipment-Composite Longbow.description: This projectile weapon is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Like all longbows, its great size also increases the bow's range and power. You must use two hands to fire it, and it cannot be used while mounted. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a longbow, such as Erastil's favored weapon, it also applies to composite longbows unless otherwise stated.
equipment-Composite Longbow.name: Composite Longbow

equipment-+2 Striking Handwraps of Might.name: +2 Striking Handwraps of Mighty Blows
equipment-+2 Striking Handwraps of Might.description:
As you invest these embroidered strips of cloth, you must meditate and slowly wrap them around your hands. These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

equipment-Leather Armor.name: Leather Armor
equipment-Leather Armor.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.

equipment-Morin Khurr.description: Handheld instruments include bagpipes, a small set of chimes, small drums, fiddles and viols, flutes and recorders, small harps, lutes, trumpets, and similarly sized instruments. The GM might rule that an especially large handheld instrument (like a tuba) has greater Bulk. Heavy instruments such as large drums, a full set of chimes, and keyboard instruments are less portable and generally need to be stationary while played.
equipment-Morin Khurr.name: Morin Khurr

equipment-Arrows.name: Arrows
equipment-Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.description:
The target makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing it using hearing or other senses alone. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use actions with the auditory trait. This prevents it from casting spells that include verbal components.

Heightened (4th) The spell effect emanates from the touched creature, silencing all sound in or passing through a 10- foot radius and preventing any auditory and sonic effects in the affected area. While within the radius, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target. Depending upon the position of the effect, a creature might notice the lack of sound reaching it (blocking off the noise coming from a party, for example).

Troop Movement.name: 部队移动 Troop Movement
Troop Movement.description: 当花之百人众行走时，部队会首先自由动作使用重整队列变成20尺见方的队形（正常减去损失的格子），然后按照速度移动。它和巨型生物移动判定类似；例如，若队伍任一格子进入困难地形，，额外移动消耗会对整个部队生效。

Rain of Knives.name: 刀刃之雨 Rain of Knives
Rain of Knives.description: 花之百人众投掷出飞刀雨，对50 尺内的一个@Template[burst|distance:10]{10尺爆发}范围造成@Damage[(4d6+13)[piercing]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:33|basic]豁免）。当部队只剩下8 格或更少时，爆发范围缩小至@Template[burst|distance:5]{5尺爆发}。

Run Them Over!.name: 闯过他们! Run Them Over!
Run Them Over!.description: 花之百人众尝试践踏路上所有敌人。部队进行一次重整队列然后行走两次，移动穿过中型或更小生物占据的空间。每个被穿过的生物受到@Damage[(4d8+14)[bludgeoning]]{4d8+14钝击伤害}（@Check[reflex|dc:33|basic]豁免）。若豁免大失败，该生物会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Whirlwind of Blades.name: 剑刃风暴 Whirlwind of Blades
Whirlwind of Blades.description:
A 到 3

频率 每轮一次

花之百人众部队挥舞刀刃，对邻接的每个敌人进行攻击（@Check[reflex|dc:33|basic]豁免）。伤害基于使用的动作数。

1 @Damage[2d8[slashing]]伤害

2 @Damage[(3d8+13)[slashing]]伤害

3 @Damage[(4d8+16)[slashing]]伤害

Hantu Belian.name: 欲从 Hantu Belian
Hantu Belian.publicNotes:
物灵指的是一类强力自然精魂现象，他们寄宿于万物之中，包括动物、静物甚至环境本身。无论他们寄宿于什么东西上，当成为精魂化身时，物灵都不再遵从先前的行为模式。一些物灵选择成为守卫，守护其所代言的森林或河流，而其他的只是单纯来到这个世界并且感受他们的物理形态——无论是巨石、竹架或者貘——所一般不能享受的体验。

物灵大多出现在民那塔群岛上，特别是在南方岛屿楞达中沙，当地的万物有灵论信仰认为物灵出现于充盈着显著精魂能量的地方。对于楞达中沙的居民来说，物灵是作为他们文明中忧虑、恐惧与灾厄的象征而显现。一个单独遇到物灵的人可能将这种相遇解释为他们在疑虑中长时间蹉跎不前的信号（或者正相反：他们长时间忽略了造成自身焦虑的缘由）。

物灵·欲从象征着猛虎的灵魂精华，并且一般表现为一只栖息在一只老虎后背的幽灵鸟。物灵·欲从一般从事着伴随巨大破坏与重建的事情。他们有时附身在类人生物上以引起巨大的纷争或灾难，尽管他们的意图一般只是出于娱乐或者无聊而非恶意。

Unrest Aura.name: 骚乱灵光 Unrest Aura
Unrest Aura.description: 30尺。进入弥漫范围的生物必须进行一次@Check[will|dc:27]豁免。一旦失败，直到下回合结束生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}（大失败则持续1分钟）。在困惑时，生物会尝试引起骚乱，通过使用它的动作来投掷周围物品或者吓唬路人从而在周遭创造混乱。生物在豁免中成功则免疫欲从的骚乱灵光1分钟。欲从可以使用一个具有专注特征的动作来停止或恢复灵光效果。

Greater Possession.name: 高等占据术 Greater Possession
Greater Possession.description: 物灵·欲从可以使用他的内在法术占据术来占据一个生物至多1个小时而非1分钟时间。当占据一个生物时，物灵使用其自身的特技、运动和隐秘调整值除非被占据的生物调整值更高。

Possession (Greater Possession).name: Possession (Greater Possession)
Possession (Greater Possession).description:
You send your mind and soul into the target's body, attempting to take control. The target must attempt a Will save. You can choose to use the effects of a degree of success more favorable to the target if you prefer. While you're possessing a target, your own body is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} and can't wake up normally. You can sense everything the possessed target does. You can Dismiss this spell. If the possessed body dies, the spell ends and you must succeed at a Fortitude save against your spell DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 hour, or 24 hours on a critical failure. If the spell ends during an encounter, you act just before the possessed creature's initiative count.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success You possess the target but can't control it. You ride along in the body while the spell lasts.

Failure You possess the target and take partial control of it. You no longer have a separate turn; instead, you might control the target. At the start of each of the target's turns, it attempts another Will save. If it fails, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} by you on that turn; if it succeeds, it chooses its own actions; and if it critically succeeds, it forces you out and the spell ends.

Critical Failure You possess the target fully, and it can only watch as you manipulate it like a puppet. The target is Controlled by you.

Heightened (9th) The duration is 10 minutes, and you can physically enter the creature's body, protecting your physical body while the spell lasts.

Daze.name: Daze
Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Remove Curse.name: Remove Curse
Remove Curse.description: Your touch grants a reprieve to a cursed creature. You attempt to counteract one curse afflicting the target. If the curse comes from a cursed item or other external source, a success indicates that the target creature can rid itself of the cursed item, but it doesn't remove the curse from the item.

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.description:
You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to five creatures.

Remove Disease.name: Remove Disease
Remove Disease.description: Healing magic purges disease from a creature's body. You attempt to counteract one disease afflicting the target.

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description:
You channel vitality energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of vitality damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 (somatic) The spell has a range of touch.

2 (verbal, somatic) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8

3 (material, somatic, verbal) You disperse vitality energy in a 30-foot emanation. This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

Light.name: Light
Light.description:
The object glows, casting bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet) like a torch. If you cast this spell again on a second object, the light spell on the first object ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.cVVZXNbV0nElVOPZ]{Spell Effect: Light}

Heightened (4th) The object sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius (and dim light for the next 60 feet).

Prestidigitation.name: Prestidigitation
Prestidigitation.description:
The simplest magic does your bidding. You can perform simple magical effects for as long as you Sustain the Spell. Each time you Sustain the Spell, you can choose one of four options.

  • Cook Cool, warm, or flavor 1 pound of nonliving material.
  • Lift Slowly lift an unattended object of light Bulk or less 1 foot off the ground.
  • Make Create a temporary object of negligible Bulk, made of congealed magical substance. The object looks crude and artificial and is extremely fragile-it can't be used as a tool, weapon, or spell component.
  • Tidy Color, clean, or soil an object of light Bulk or less. You can affect an object of 1 Bulk with 10 rounds of concentration, and a larger object a 1 minute per Bulk.

Prestidigitation can't deal damage or cause adverse conditions. Any actual change to an object (beyond what is noted above) persists only as long as you Sustain the Spell.

Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Hantu Denai.name: 怨迹 Hantu Denai
Hantu Denai.publicNotes:
物灵指的是一类强力自然精魂现象，他们寄宿于万物之中，包括动物、静物甚至环境本身。无论他们寄宿于什么东西上，当成为精魂化身时，物灵都不再遵从先前的行为模式。一些物灵选择成为守卫，守护其所代言的森林或河流，而其他的只是单纯来到这个世界并且感受他们的物理形态——无论是巨石、竹架或者貘——所一般不能享受的体验。

物灵大多出现在民那塔（Minata）群岛上，特别是在南方岛屿楞达中沙（rendah pulu），当地的万物有灵论信仰认为物灵出现于充盈着显著精魂能量的地方。对于楞达中沙的居民来说，物灵是作为他们文明中忧虑、恐惧与灾厄的象征而显现。一个单独遇到物灵的人可能将这种相遇解释为他们在疑虑中长时间蹉跎不前的信号（或者正相反：他们长时间忽略了造成自身焦虑的缘由）。

有趣的是，虽然物灵是无形的，但无论何种物灵都依然保有着可以触碰到的特性。有些会散发强烈的气味，例如榴莲或者茉莉花的香味。另一些则会遗留一些生理代谢物，一如字面意义上的动物粪便或者挂在树木枝干上的一撮毛发。

当森林或是河流环境存在被过度狩猎或捕捞的风险时，大地自身会作为物灵·怨迹显现以保护自身免遭过度损耗。物灵·怨迹会悄悄跟踪猎人并发出当地动物的哭嚎来吓退偷猎者、伐木者和其他掠夺大自然的家伙，在必要时会诉诸武力。

Sound Imitation.name: 声音模仿 Sound Imitation
Sound Imitation.description: 物灵·怨迹进行一次欺骗技能检定，如果成功则得以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ewwCglB7XOPLUz72]{说谎 Lie}模仿其环境中原生动物的声音。在这次检定中，它获得+4环境加值。

Terrifying Cry.name: 恐吓嚎鸣 Terrifying Cry
Terrifying Cry.description:
物灵·怨迹爆发出动物长啸来恐吓四周生物。在@Template[emanation|distance:120]{120尺弥漫}范围内每个生物必须进行一@Check[will|dc:27] 豁免并且随后免疫怨迹的恐吓嚎鸣1分钟。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

失败 生物陷入1轮@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}状态并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。

大失败 生物陷入1轮@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}状态并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 怨迹的打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物造成额外2d6精准伤害。

Huldrin Skolsdottir.name: 胡尔德林·斯科尔斯多蒂 Huldrin Skolsdottir

Reactive Strike (Special).name: 反应打击 Reactive Strike (特殊)
Reactive Strike (Special).description:
胡尔德林每回合获得一个额外反应动作，但只能用于反应打击。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Shield Block.name: 盾牌格挡 Shield Block
Shield Block.description:
当一个和胡尔德林相邻的盟友受到攻击伤害，或当胡尔德林尝试反射豁免后受到任何伤害时（甚至非物理伤害），同样也能触发此反应动作。根据情况，这能抵挡该名盟友或胡尔德林受到的伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ShieldBlock]

Iron Maiden Stance.name: 铁女架势 Iron Maiden Stance
Iron Maiden Stance.description:
需求 胡尔德林持握盾牌

效果 胡尔德林获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{举起盾牌 Raise a Shield}的好处，直到她不再满足此架势的需求。当在此架势中时，每当盟友的打击对胡尔德林触及范围内的敌人造成伤害，该敌人受到@Damage[1d6[piercing]]伤害。

Attack of Opportunity (Special).name: Attack of Opportunity (Special)
Attack of Opportunity (Special).description:
Huldrin gets 1 extra reaction each turn that she can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

equipment-Shield Spikes.name: Shield Spikes
equipment-Shield Spikes.description: These metal spikes are strategically placed on the defensive side of the shield to deal piercing damage with a shield bash.

equipment-Trident.name: Trident
equipment-Trident.description: This three-pronged, spear-like weapon typically has a 4-foot shaft. Like a spear, it can be wielded with one hand or thrown.

Sturdy Shield (Greater).name: Sturdy Shield (Greater)
Sturdy Shield (Greater).description:
With a superior design and excellent craftsmanship, this steel shield has higher Hardness than its non-magical counterparts, making it harder to break and destroy.

The shield has Hardness 15, HP 120, and BT 60.

equipment-Hide Armor.name: Hide Armor
equipment-Hide Armor.description: A mix of furs, sturdy hide, and sometimes molded boiled leather, this armor provides protection due to its layers of leather, though its bulkiness slows the wearer down and decreases mobility.

prototypeToken.name: 胡尔德林·斯科尔斯多蒂

Hummingbird.name: 无境·蜂鸟 Hummingbird
Hummingbird.blurb: 女性鬣狗人承流学会化形者

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
化形者变成中型气元素，或变回鬣狗人形态。在元素形态下，她拥有飞行速度60尺，她的移动不会触发反应动作，并且她唯一能使用的打击是带有灵巧特征的狂风打击（造成@Damage[(3d8+5)[bludgeoning]]伤害，外加@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{击倒 Knockdown}）。她在此形态下无法施法。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Drain Bonded Item.name: 汲取联结物品 Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 化形者在自己的回合中尚未行动

效果 在此回合中，化形者能再次施放一个她已经施放过的准备法术，不需要消耗法术位。

Produce Flame.name: Produce Flame
Produce Flame.description:
A small ball of flame appears in the palm of your hand, and you lash out with it either in melee or at range. Make a spell attack roll against your target's AC. This is normally a ranged attack, but you can also make a melee attack against a creature in your unarmed reach.

On a success, you deal 2d4 fire damage. On a critical success, the target takes double damage and @Damage[(@item.level)d4[persistent,fire]] damage.

Heightened (+1) Increase the damage by 1d4 and the persistent damage on a critical hit by 1d4.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

True Strike.name: True Strike
True Strike.description:
A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fpGDAz2v5PG0zUSl]{Spell Effect: Sure Strike}

Unseen Servant.name: Unseen Servant
Unseen Servant.description:
You summon an unseen servant, which you can command as part of Sustaining the Spell. It serves you until its Hit Points are reduced to 0, at which point the spell ends, or until you stop Sustaining the Spell. The unseen servant gains the summoned trait.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.j7NNPfZwD19BwSEZ]{Unseen Servant} (No Alignment)

equipment-Staff.name: Staff
equipment-Staff.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

Unfettered Pack.name: Unfettered Pack
Unfettered Pack.description:
You free those who travel alongside you from environmental hindrances. Targets don't take circumstance penalties to Speed from vegetation, rubble, winds, or other properties of the environment, whether or not the environment is magical, and they ignore difficult terrain from such environmental properties.

Heightened (9th) The targets also ignore greater difficult terrain from environmental properties.

Baleful Polymorph.name: Baleful Polymorph
Baleful Polymorph.description:
You transform the target creature into a harmless animal appropriate to the area, with effects based on its Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's body gains minor features of the harmless animal. Its insides churn as they partially transform, causing it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. When it recovers from the Sickened condition, its features revert to normal.

Failure The target transforms for 1 minute but keeps its mind. If it spends all its actions on its turn concentrating on its original form, it can attempt a Will save to end the effect immediately.

Critical Failure The target is transformed into the chosen harmless animal, body and mind, for an unlimited duration.

Flesh to Stone.name: Flesh to Stone
Flesh to Stone.description:
You try to turn the target's flesh into stone. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and must attempt a Fortitude save at the end of each of its turns; this ongoing save has the incapacitation trait. On a failed save, the Slowed condition increases by 1 (or 2 on a critical failure). A successful save reduces the Slowed condition by 1. When a creature is unable to act due to the Slowed condition from flesh to stone, the creature is permanently non-magically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified}. The spell ends if the creature is Petrified or the Slowed condition is removed.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is initially @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2}.

Black Tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
Black Tentacles.description:
Area 20-foot burst adjacent to a flat surface

Oily black tentacles rise up and attempt to capture creatures in the area. Make spell attack rolls against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. Any creature you succeed against is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} and takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the tentacles attempt to grab that creature if they haven't already, and they deal @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage to any creature already Grabbed.

The tentacles' Escape DC is equal to your spell DC. A creature can attack a tentacle in an attempt to release its grip. Its AC is equal to your spell DC, and it is destroyed if it takes 12 or more damage. Even if destroyed, additional tentacles continue to grow in the area until the duration ends. You can Dismiss the spell.

Elemental Form.name: Elemental Form
Elemental Form.description:
You call upon the power of the planes to transform into a Medium elemental battle form. When you Cast this Spell, choose a listed element. While in this form, you gain the corresponding trait and the elemental trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +18, and your damage bonus is +9. These are Dexterity based (air, fire, or metal) or Strength based (earth, water, or wood). If your corresponding unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics (air, fire, or metal) or Athletics (earth, water, or wood) modifier of +20; ignore this change if your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air
    • fly 80 feet, movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust, Damage 1d4 bludgeoning.
  • Earth
    • Speed 20 feet, burrow 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 boulder, Damage 2d10 bludgeoning.
  • Fire
    • Speed 50 feet; fire resistance 10, weakness 5 to cold and 5 to water;
    • Melee 1 tendril, Damage 1d8 fire plus 1d4 persistent fire.
  • Metal
    • Speed 40 feet, fly 20 feet;
    • Melee 1 blade (versatile piercing), Damage 1d8 slashing plus 1d4 electricity.
  • Water
    • Speed 20 feet, swim 60 feet; fire resistance 5;
    • Melee 1 wave, Damage 1d12 bludgeoning, and you can spend an action immediately after a hit to push the target 5 feet with the effects of a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}.
  • Wood
    • Speed 20 feet, climb 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 branch, Damage 2d10 bludgeoning.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Large and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +23, a damage bonus of +13, and Acrobatics or Athletics +23.

Heightened (7th) Your battle form is Huge and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have space to expand or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 20 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +25, a damage bonus of +11, double the number of damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics or Athletics +25.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Qp0dlhJaCzXIx73r]{Spell Effect: Elemental Form}

Moon Frenzy.name: Moon Frenzy
Moon Frenzy.description:
A feral aspect overcomes the targets, making them tough and savage. Targets gain 5 temporary Hit Points, a +10-foot status bonus to their Speeds, and weakness 5 to silver. They also grow vicious fangs and claws, which are unarmed attacks. The fangs deal 2d8 piercing damage; the claws deal 2d6 slashing damage and have the agile and finesse traits. The targets use their highest weapon or unarmed attack proficiency with these attacks, and if they have weapon specialization or greater weapon specialization, they add this damage as well. On a critical hit with one of these unarmed attacks, the creature struck takes @Damage[1d4[bleed]].

The targets can't use concentrate actions unless those actions also have the rage trait, with the exception of Seek. A creature can attempt to end the spell's effect on itself by using a single action, which has the rage trait, to attempt a Will save against your spell DC; on a success, it ends the spell's effect on itself.

If a target is in the light of a full moon, it also grows by one size if it were Medium or smaller. This increases the reach of a Medium or Tiny creature by 5 feet.

Heightened (6th) The temporary Hit Points increase to 10, the silver weakness to 10, and the damage dealt by the attacks to three dice.

Heightened (10th) The temporary Hit Points increase to 20, the silver weakness to 20, and the damage dealt by the attacks to four dice.

Tongues.name: Tongues
Tongues.description:
The target can understand all words regardless of language and also speak the languages of other creatures. When in a mixed group of creatures, each time the target speaks, it can choose a creature and speak in a language that creature understands, even if the target doesn't know what language that is.

Heightened (7th) The duration is 8 hours.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Heightened (7th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description:
Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 6 creatures.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description:
You dilate the flow of time around the target, slowing its actions.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} for 1 minute.

Heightened (6th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

Barkskin.name: Barkskin
Barkskin.description:
The target's skin becomes covered in bark. The target gains resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing damage and weakness 3 to fire. After the target takes fire damage, it can Dismiss the spell as a free action triggered by taking the damage; doing so doesn't reduce the fire damage the target was dealt.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.HoOujAdQWCN4E6sQ]{Spell Effect: Oaken Resilience}

Heightened (+2) The resistances increase by 2, and the weakness increases by 3.

Enlarge.name: Enlarge
Enlarge.description:
