If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit one of the images, one of the images is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against you. Once all the images are destroyed, the spell ends.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.0PO5mFRhh9HxGAtv]{Spell Effect: Mirror Image}

Touch of Idiocy.name: Touch of Idiocy
Touch of Idiocy.description:
You dull the target's mind; the target must attempt a Will save.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4}.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description:
You raise a magical shield of force. This counts as using the Raise a Shield action, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, but it doesn't require a hand to use.

While the spell is in effect, you can use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with your magic shield. The shield has Hardness 5. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gKKqvLohtrSJj3BM]{Force Barrage} spell.

Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Jemq5UknGdMO7b73]{Spell Effect: Shield}

Heightened (3rd) The shield has Hardness 10.

Heightened (5th) The shield has Hardness 15.

Heightened (7th) The shield has Hardness 20.

Heightened (9th) The shield has Hardness 25.

equipment-Bracers of Armor I.name: Bracers of Armor I
equipment-Bracers of Armor I.description: These stiff leather armguards grant you a +1 item bonus to AC and saving throws, and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. You can affix talismans to bracers of armor as though they were light armor.

Physical Boost.name: Physical Boost
Physical Boost.description:
You temporarily improve the target's physique. The target gains a +2 status bonus to the next Acrobatics check, Athletics check, Fortitude save, or Reflex save it attempts.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.XT3AyRfx4xeXfAjP]{Spell Effect: Physical Boost}

True Target.name: True Target
True Target.description: You delve into the possible futures of the next few seconds to understand all the ways your foe might avoid harm, then cast out a vision of that future to those around you. Designate a creature. The first time each target makes an attack roll against that creature during true target's duration, the attacker rolls twice and uses the better result. The attacker also ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the designated creature being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning
Chain Lightning.description:
You discharge a powerful bolt of lightning at the target, dealing 8d12 electricity damage. The target must attempt a basic Reflex save. The electricity arcs to another creature within 30 feet of the first target, jumps to another creature within 30 feet of that target, and so on. You can end the chain at any point. You can't target the same creature more than once, and you must have line of effect to all targets. Roll the damage only once, and apply it to each target (halving or doubling as appropriate for its saving throw outcome). The chain ends if any one of the targets critically succeeds at its save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

Disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
Disintegrate.description:
You fire a green ray at your target. Make a spell attack. You deal 12d10 damage, and the target must attempt a basic Fortitude save. On a critical hit, treat the save result as one degree worse. A creature reduced to 0 HP is reduced to fine powder; its gear remains. An object you hit is destroyed (no save), regardless of Hardness, unless it's an artifact or similarly hard to destroy. A single casting can destroy no more than a 10-foot cube of matter. This automatically destroys any force construct, such as a wall of force.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d10.

Vampiric Exsanguination.name: Vampiric Exsanguination
Vampiric Exsanguination.description:
You draw in the blood and life force of other creatures through your outstretched arms. You deal 12d6 void damage to living creatures in the area. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half the damage a single creature takes from this spell; calculate these temporary Hit Points using the creature that took the most damage. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Black Tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
Black Tentacles.description:
Area 20-foot burst adjacent to a flat surface

Oily black tentacles rise up and attempt to capture creatures in the area. Make spell attack rolls against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. Any creature you succeed against is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} and takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the tentacles attempt to grab that creature if they haven't already, and they deal @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage to any creature already Grabbed.

The tentacles' Escape DC is equal to your spell DC. A creature can attack a tentacle in an attempt to release its grip. Its AC is equal to your spell DC, and it is destroyed if it takes 12 or more damage. Even if destroyed, additional tentacles continue to grow in the area until the duration ends. You can Dismiss the spell.

True Strike.name: True Strike
True Strike.description:
A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.fpGDAz2v5PG0zUSl]{Spell Effect: Sure Strike}

Confusion.name: Confusion
Confusion.description:
You befuddle your target with strange impulses, causing it to act randomly. The effects are determined by the target's Will save. You can Dismiss the spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target babbles incoherently and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confusion.

Critical Failure The target is Confused for 1 minute, with no save to end early.

Heightened (8th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Fly.name: Fly
Fly.description:
The target can soar through the air, gaining a fly Speed equal to its Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Heightened (7th) The duration increases to 1 hour.

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description:
A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12.

Acid Splash.name: Acid Splash
Acid Splash.description:
You splash a glob of acid that splatters your target and nearby creatures. Make a spell attack. If you hit, you deal 1d6 acid damage plus 1 splash acid damage. On a critical success, the target also takes @Damage[(ceil(@item.level/2))[persistent,acid]] damage.

Heightened (3rd) The initial damage increases to 2d6, and the persistent damage increases to 2.

Heightened (5th) The initial damage increases to 3d6, the persistent damage increases to 3, and the splash damage increases to 2.

Heightened (7th) The initial damage increases to 4d6, the persistent damage increases to 4, and the splash damage increases to 3.

Heightened (9th) The initial damage increases to 5d6, the persistent damage increases to 5, and the splash damage increases to 4.

Daze.name: Daze
Daze.description:
You cloud the target's mind and daze it with a mental jolt. The jolt deals mental damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier; the target must attempt a basic Will save. If the target critically fails the save, it is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Fleet Step.name: Fleet Step
Fleet Step.description: You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Hand of the Apprentice.name: Hand of the Apprentice
Hand of the Apprentice.description:
You take advantage of one of the most fundamental lessons of magic to levitate and propel your weapon. You hurl a held melee weapon with which you are trained at the target, making a spell attack roll. On a success, you deal the weapon's damage as if you had hit with a melee Strike, but adding your spellcasting ability modifier to damage, rather than your Strength modifier. On a critical success, you deal double damage, and you add the weapon's critical specialization effect. Regardless of the outcome, the weapon flies back to you and returns to your hand.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.MsXuzUrCGVuRGWK7]{Spell Effect: Hand of the Apprentice}

Mage Hand.name: Mage Hand
Mage Hand.description:
You create a single magical hand, either invisible or ghostlike, that grasps the target object and moves it slowly up to 20 feet. Because you're levitating the object, you can move it in any direction. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the object an additional 20 feet. If the object is in the air when the spell ends, the object falls.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

Ray of Enfeeblement.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
A ray that saps a foe's strength flashes from your hand. Attempt a ranged spell attack against the target. If you succeed, that creature attempts a Fortitude save to determine the spell's effect. If your attack roll is a critical success, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}.

Shocking Grasp.name: Shocking Grasp
Shocking Grasp.description:
You shroud your hands in a crackling field of lightning. Make a melee spell attack roll. On a hit, the target takes 2d12 electricity damage. If the target is wearing metal armor or is made of metal, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll with shocking grasp, and the target also takes @Damage[(1d4+((@item.level)-1))[persistent,electricity]] damage on a hit. On a critical hit, double the initial damage, but not the persistent damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d12, and the persistent electricity damage increases by 1.

Tanglefoot.name: Tanglefoot
Tanglefoot.description:
A vine covered in sticky sap appears from thin air, flicking from your hand and lashing itself to the target. Attempt a spell attack against the target.

Critical Success The target gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty and the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} condition.

Success The target takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC to remove the penalty.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.TwtUIEyenrtAbeiX]{Spell Effect: Tangle Vine}

Failure The target is unaffected.

Heightened (2nd) The effects last for 2 rounds.

Heightened (4th) The effects last for 1 minute.

equipment-Longsword.name: Longsword
equipment-Longsword.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.

equipment-+1 Striking Handwraps of Might.name: +1 Striking Handwraps of Mighty Blows
equipment-+1 Striking Handwraps of Might.description:
As you invest these embroidered strips of cloth, you must meditate and slowly wrap them around your hands. These handwraps have weapon runes etched into them to give your unarmed attacks the benefits of those runes, making your unarmed attacks work like magic weapons. For example, +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows would give you a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with your unarmed attacks and increase the damage of your unarmed attacks from one weapon die to two (normally 2d4 instead of 1d4, but if your fists have a different weapon damage die or you have other unarmed attacks, use two of that die size instead).

You can upgrade, add, and transfer runes to and from the handwraps just as you would for a weapon, and you can attach talismans to the handwraps. Treat the handwraps as melee weapons of the brawling group with light Bulk for these purposes. Property runes apply only when they would be applicable to the unarmed attack you're using. For example, a property that must be applied to a slashing weapon wouldn't function when you attacked with a fist, but you would gain its benefits if you attacked with a claw or some other slashing unarmed attack.

Mammoth Turtle.name: 猛犸象龟 Mammoth Turtle
Mammoth Turtle.publicNotes: 如果一般大小的鳄龟只是脾气暴躁，那么巨鳄龟貌似会以暴力回敬任何胆敢入侵它领地的生物。估测长度有20尺长，数千磅重的这种巨型生物能一口吞下整个类人生物。定居在沼泽的社会，尤其是沼蜍人（boggards）和蜥蜴人（lizardfolk）往往会试图驯养巨鳄龟作为强大的守护兽。但是在大多数情况下这种尝试只会导致巨大的伤亡。那些不幸被巨鳄龟一口吞下的人会发现，这种动物的胃和铠甲一样坚硬，很难从里面切开。

Fling.name: 抛掷 Fling
Fling.description:
需求 猛犸象龟正用啃咬擒抱着一只生物

效果 猛犸象龟用嘴将该生物甩入空中，将其甩至10尺高20 尺远。该生物坠落25尺（假设尽可能甩飞到最高点）并受到对应的坠落伤害。(@Damage[12[bludgeoning]]伤害)

Shell Defense.name: 龟壳防御 Shell Defense
Shell Defense.description: 猛犸象龟将它的四肢和头缩回龟壳里，然后结束它的回合。这能将其AC增加至38，但它无法再进行其他动作，除非它再用一个单动作从龟壳里出来。

Capsize.name: 倾覆 Capsize
Capsize.description: 猛犸象龟尝试倾覆一艘体型相同或小于它的、与它相邻的水面船只。猛犸象龟 必须成功通过一次@Check[athletics|dc:43]检定（目标船只的体型每比巨鳄龟小一级，DC减少5点）或驾驶者的航海学识DC，二者以较高者为准。

Manananggal.name: 马纳南加尔 Manananggal
Manananggal.publicNotes:
马纳南加尔是一种白天像类人生物生活而半夜却吸食他们的邪恶怪物。为了隐藏自身的邪恶，这些生物会伪装成普通人——一般是隐士或者怪人——然后从他们身边社区中挑选出下一个在夜幕降临时袭击的目标。马纳南加尔使用它们细长、中空的舌头从受害者的重要器官，例如肝脏，吸食受害者的血液，因此留下的奇怪血痕使得人们难以断定死者死亡的具体原因。这一般会导致疑惑、猜疑与不信任在社区蔓延，其也正是马纳南加尔所乐于见到的。当他们飞行时，马纳南加尔会发出独特的声音，人们因此也将其称为“滴答-滴答”，而深受其害的社区会一听到这种提示音就陷入恐惧的混乱中。

马纳南加尔和其他种类的残留妖（tanggals） ，例如庞南加兰（Penanggalan）一样具有吸食血液、躯体分离的特性，但一些特性让他们与众不同。例如，马纳南加尔喜欢醋味甚至用醋洗澡，而庞南加兰却连轻微醋味都觉得讨厌。

Separated Body.name: 躯体分离 Separated Body
Separated Body.description:
马纳南加尔一般会模仿活着的类人生物。在第一眼看来，其外形不像异怪并且在他模仿时他的欺骗技能 DC 获得+4状态加值。但是在夜晚时，马纳南加尔可以使用一个具有操作特征的3动作行为，将他上半身与下半身撕裂开来，遗留的下半身失去力量不能自理，但是使得上半身可以自由飞行。马纳南加尔可以在任何时候分离躯体，但是它在白天时分离会有被进一步伤害的风险。

马纳南加尔的上下半身具有同样数值的HP。如果他的下半身受到伤害，马纳南加尔会立刻察觉到攻击。在日出后日落前，马纳南加尔每保持分离状态一分钟，下半身受到[[/r 2d6]]伤害直到它上下半身重新结合或者被摧毁，以先发生时间为准。

Blood Drain.name: 饮血 Blood Drain
Blood Drain.description:
需求 马纳南加尔擒抱了一只生物。

效果 马纳南加尔驱动它的舌头去吸取被擒抱生物的鲜血。造成[[/r 4d6]]伤害，并且马纳南加尔获得等同于所造成伤害数值的临时生命值。被马纳南加尔吸取血量的生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}直到它得到治疗（任何方式和数值）。

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.description:
Each creature in the area becomes drowsy and might fall asleep. A creature that falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} from this spell doesn't fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} or release what it's holding. This spell doesn't prevent creatures from waking up due to a successful Perception check, limiting its utility in combat.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks for 1 round.

Failure The creature falls Unconscious. If it's still Unconscious after 1 minute, it wakes up automatically.

Critical Failure The creature falls Unconscious. If it's still Unconscious after 1 hour, it wakes up automatically.

Heightened (4th) The creatures fall Unconscious for 1 round on a failure or 1 minute on a critical failure. They fall Prone and release what they're holding, and they can't attempt Perception checks to wake up. When the duration ends, the creature is sleeping normally instead of automatically waking up.

Fear.name: Fear
Fear.description:
You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to five creatures.

Darkness.description:
You create a shroud of darkness that prevents light from penetrating or emanating within the area. Light does not enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, do not emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. This also suppresses magical light of your darkness spell's rank or lower. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. From outside, it appears as a globe of pure darkness.

Heightened (4th) Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness. They treat targets seen through the darkness as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}.
Darkness.name: Darkness

Dancing Lights.description: You create up to four floating lights, no two of which are more than 10 feet apart. Each sheds light like a torch. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move any number of lights up to 60 feet. Each light must remain within 120 feet of you and within 10 feet of all others, or it winks out.
Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights

Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
A ray that saps a foe's strength flashes from your hand. Attempt a ranged spell attack against the target. If you succeed, that creature attempts a Fortitude save to determine the spell's effect. If your attack roll is a critical success, use the outcome for one degree of success worse than the result of its save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}.
Ray of Enfeeblement.name: Ray of Enfeeblement

Lasting Debilitating Strike.name: 持久衰弱打击 Lasting Debilitating Strike
Lasting Debilitating Strike.description:
触发 勋的打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的敌人造成伤害

效果 勋从以下衰弱效果中选择一种，直到勋的下回合结束；如果勋造成重击，则持续一周。

衰弱 目标的速度受到-10尺状态减值。

衰弱 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。

Looming Threat.name: 逼近威胁 Looming Threat
Looming Threat.description: 大师勋@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{快步 Steps}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feints}， 然后进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralizes}。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 大师勋对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的敌人造成额外3d6精准伤害。

equipment-Dagger.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.
equipment-Dagger.name: Dagger

Melodic Squall.name: 旋律暴风 Melodic Squall
Melodic Squall.publicNotes: 这片由歌声组成的云团随风而动。虽然风中旋律（被一些人成为歌之元素，但是事实上已知的多元宇宙中并不存在乐曲位面之类的地方）也许能享受音乐之美，但它本质上也是一种具有破坏性力量的元素。

Hostile Duet.name: 敌意二重奏 Hostile Duet
Hostile Duet.description:
触发 1个30尺内的敌对生物，使用一个带有听觉特征的效果来为它或它的盟友提供加值

效果 旋律暴风模仿该具有听觉特征的源效果，为它和它的盟友带来同样的加值，持续时间和源效果相同。

Retune.name: 重新调音 Retune
Retune.description:
触发 旋律暴风被一个带有听觉特征的法术作为目标

效果 旋律暴风尝试反制该法术。如果成功，该法术效果就会被一阵风吹回起点，影响法术施放者。除旋律暴风之外，该触发效果的其他目标依然会正常受到影响。

Mesmerizing Melody.name: 催眠旋律 Mesmerizing Melody
Mesmerizing Melody.description:
旋律暴风发出洪亮的合唱声。任何位于@Template[emanation|distance:30]{30尺弥散}范围内的生物必须尝试1次@Check[will|dc:36]检定来抵抗旋律暴风的迷魂效果。豁免成功的生物将在24小时内对催眠旋律临时免疫。T

大成功 目标生物不受影响。

成功 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}，持续1轮。

失败 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated}，持续[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

YA860LZZWe43vErM.name: 次声爆炸 Subsonic Burst
YA860LZZWe43vErM.description:
旋律暴风将猛烈的听不见的次声波聚焦于@Template[line|distance:100]{100尺直线}范围。支线中的每个生物都必须尝试@Check[fortitude|dc:34]豁免。

成功 目标生物不受影响。

失败 目标生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}。

大失败 目标生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}，并且还会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}，直到旋律暴风的下个回合开始。

Swiftness.name: 迅捷 Swiftness
Swiftness.description: 旋律暴风在移动时不会触发反应动作。

Subsonic Burst.name: Subsonic Burst
Subsonic Burst.description:
The melodic squall focuses intense sound at an inaudible frequency in a @Template[line|distance:100]. Each creature in the line must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:34] save.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} until the beginning of the melodic squall's next turn.

Mogaru's Breath.name: 魔加鲁的吐息 Mogaru's Breath
Mogaru's Breath.disable: @Check[performance|dc:50|name:转移魔加鲁的注意]（传奇）或 @Check[deception|dc:53|name:转移魔加鲁的注意]（传奇）片刻转移魔加鲁的注意。
Mogaru's Breath.hazarddescription: 魔加鲁喷出炽热烈焰，扫清区域内所有挡路的渣渣。
Mogaru's Breath.reset: 魔加鲁必须等待[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}才能进行另一次喷火。

Volcanic Breath.name: 猛烈吐息 Volcanic Breath
Volcanic Breath.description:
触发 一个生物对魔加鲁进行敌对行为，制造可见的区域效果，或在魔加鲁120尺范围内飞行

效果 魔加鲁对目标喷出@Template[cone|distance:120]{120尺锥形}火焰。该地区的易燃物立即被点燃，石头或金属地表会融化为困难地形。该地区的生物受到@Damage[20d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:44|basic]豁免）。如果豁免失败或大失败，生物还会受到@Damage[3d6[persistent,fire]]伤害。

Muckish Creep.name: 淤泥蹒跚怪 Muckish Creep
Muckish Creep.publicNotes:
传说第一个淤泥蹒跚怪诞生自一处乱葬岗，那片土地与谋杀犯们的灵魂互相纠缠一起。还有故事说淤泥蹒跚怪是一群因为过于邪恶而导致其亲族从土元素位面被驱逐出来的元素生物。无论那种起源是真的，淤泥蹒跚怪都是由泥泞聚合成类人形态的邪恶生物。然而，其淤泥中不只是原生土壤与水的混合物，对于以活体的鲜血为食的淤泥蹒跚怪而言，他们会用鲜血来保持自身形态的湿润与延展性。

在淤泥蹒跚怪奔向所选择的猎物时，它会极其顽固且专心。一旦淤泥蹒跚怪选择了下个受害者，就没有什么能阻止它，因为它可以从门、墙壁和窗户之间最细小的缝隙渗过。淤泥蹒跚怪一般会等到目标睡着，然后前往其家中进行杀害。尽管在捕猎时它十分固执，但在它实际杀害时却很务实，它会用自己的身躯将泥巴填充进受害者的呼吸道然后让他们窒息。

Compression.name: 收缩 Compression
Compression.description: 淤泥蹒跚怪可以无需@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{挤入 Squeeze}移动通过至少6英尺宽缝隙，并且可以挤入通过任何至少1英尺宽的缝隙。

Mud Trail.name: 泥巴痕迹 Mud Trail
Mud Trail.description: 当淤泥蹒跚怪行走或者快步，它身后会有一条黏糊糊的泥巴痕迹涂留在经过的区域。任何经过的区域直到蹒跚怪下个回合都覆盖有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wu0xFpewMKRK3HG8]{油腻术 Grease}(@Check[reflex|dc:26]或@Check[acrobatics|dc:26|name:Mud Trails])。

Slippery Body.name: 黏滑躯体 Slippery Body
Slippery Body.description: 淤泥蹒跚怪的身体使得其可以从大多数限制中滑出。在逃脱检定时其获得+4状态加值。如果成功，则改为大成功代替。如果大失败，则改为失败代替。

Elude Grasp.name: 脱离擒抱 Elude Grasp
Elude Grasp.description:
触发 一个生物在一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}淤泥蹒跚怪的检定中成功。

效果 淤泥蹒跚怪尝试一次运动检定@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}。

Blinding Mud.name: 致盲泥土 Blinding Mud
Blinding Mud.description: 当淤泥蹒跚怪用泥巴球打击击中一个生物时，生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}（如果大成功则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}）。生物可以用一个交互动作擦去泥巴从而移除目眩或目盲状态。

Overwhelm.name: 淹没 Overwhelm
Overwhelm.description:
需求 淤泥蹒跚怪擒抱住一个生物

效果 淤泥蹒跚怪用泥巴填充进生物的嘴和鼻子。生物开始窒息直到它通过一次@Check[fortitude|dc:23]豁免。窒息中的生物或任何临近生物可以用一个交互动作来清理干净窒息者的呼吸道。

Quick Change.name: 快速变装 Quick Change
Quick Change.description: 奈燕妃伪装成一个普通人，看起来就像一个中立阵营且有着一份平常职业，例如普通工人、牧民或者农民，的平庸之人。她可以在任何时候通过再次使用快速变装回归她作为女皇的通常外貌。

Debilitating Strike.name: 衰弱打击 Debilitating Strike
Debilitating Strike.description:
触发 奈燕妃攻击一个措手不及生物并造成伤害。

效果 奈燕妃使用一项以下列举的衰弱效果，持续到她下个回合结束。

  • 衰弱 目标速度受到-10尺状态减值。
  • 衰弱 目标获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。
  • 衰弱 目标不能夹击其他生物，并且也不能给他的盟友提供夹击。
  • 衰弱 目标不能从举起盾牌动作中获得AC环境加值；强效掩蔽或者寻找掩蔽动作只能让它的AC获得+2环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.yBTASi3FvnReAwHy]{效果：衰弱打击}

Master Strike.name: 大师一击 Master Strike
Master Strike.description:
触发 奈燕妃攻击一个措手不及的生物并造成伤害。

效果 目标尝试一次@Check[fortitude|dc:39]豁免。之后1 天，目标免疫奈燕妃的大师一击。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，直到奈燕妃下个回合结束。

失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}4轮。

大失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}4 轮，或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}2小时，或者被杀（由奈燕妃选择）。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: 奈燕妃的打击对@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Off-Guard}的生物造成额外4d6精准伤害。

equipment-Butterfly Sword.name: Butterfly Sword
equipment-Butterfly Sword.description: This short, single-edged sword typically features a cross guard that helps catch oncoming attacks. It is the preferred weapon of Butterfly Blades-highly skilled Gokan assassins.

equipment-Explorer's Clothing.name: Explorer's Clothing
equipment-Explorer's Clothing.description: Adventurers who don't wear armor travel in durable clothing. Though it's not armor and uses your unarmored defense proficiency, it still has a Dex Cap and can grant an item bonus to AC if etched with potency runes.

equipment-Hat of Disguise (Greater).name: Hat of Disguise (Greater)
equipment-Hat of Disguise (Greater).description:
This ordinary-looking hat allows you to cloak yourself in illusions.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency any number of times per day

Effect The hat casts a 2nd-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} spell on you. While setting up the disguise, you can magically alter the hat to appear as a comb, ribbon, helm, or other piece of headwear.

Divine Destruction.name: 神圣毁灭 Divine Destruction
Divine Destruction.description:
当神圣守卫的生命值减少至0时，它在@Template[emanation|distance:30]{30尺弥漫}范围内爆发出神圣能量，造成@Damage[14d6[vitality]]伤害。范围内的每个生物都必须尝试一次@Check[will|dc:32]豁免。

大成功 生物受到一半伤害。

成功 生物受到全部伤害。

失败 生物受到全部伤害，并且受到守护神的临时诅咒。该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1日；这是一个诅咒效果，使用神圣守卫的意志DC作为其反制DC。

大失败 类似失败，只是生物会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}。

Faith Bound.name: 信仰束缚 Faith Bound
Faith Bound.description: 神圣守卫无法攻击那些公开穿戴或展示其守护神圣徽的生物，除非该生物先对神圣守护者做出敌对动作。如果神圣守卫具有智慧，它也可能会对那些它认为信仰不够虔诚或仅仅是穿戴圣徽来骗自己的生物发动攻击（通常是通过一次察觉检定来进行察言观色动作）。

Faithful Weapon.name: 信仰武器 Faithful Weapon
Faithful Weapon.description: 神圣守卫总是持握着守护神祇的偏好武器。如果该武器为远程武器，神圣守卫每次进行远程攻击的时候会自动生成弹药。如果神圣守卫的等级达到4级以上，当神圣守卫持握着偏好武器时，该武器自动获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.DxCuJKynlnMQZHgp]{强击 Striking}符文；12级以上则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.KCQRFvUgbyclvOGi]{高等强击 Greater Striking}符文，19级以上则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.woxl2FrrgAcJDu0t]{上等强击 Major Striking}符文。

Instrument of Faith.name: 信仰道标 Instrument of Faith
Instrument of Faith.description: 神圣守卫是其神祇信仰的信标。与神圣守卫拥有同一守护神的牧师，能从一个60尺内可见的神圣守卫身上引导@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}。该牧师可以决定该法术的目标或范围，就如同他们站在神圣守卫当前所处位置施法一般。

Athletic Rush.name: Athletic Rush
Athletic Rush.description:
Your body fills with physical power and skill.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to Speed and a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks. As a part of Casting this Spell, you can use a Stride, Leap, Climb, or Swim action. The spell's bonuses apply during that action.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.57lnrCzGUcNUBP2O]{Spell Effect: Athletic Rush}

Enduring Might.name: Enduring Might
Enduring Might.description:
Trigger An attack or effect would deal damage to you.

Your own might mingles with divine power to protect you. You gain resistance equal to 8 plus your Strength modifier against all damage from the triggering attack or effect.

Heightened (+1) The resistance increases by 2.

Perfected Form.name: Perfected Form
Perfected Form.description:
Trigger You fail a saving throw against a morph, petrification, or polymorph effect.

Reroll the saving throw and use the better result.

Perfected Mind.name: Perfected Mind
Perfected Mind.description: You meditate upon perfection to remove all distractions from your mind. Attempt a new Will save against one mental effect currently affecting you that required a Will save. Use the result of this new save to determine the outcome of the mental effect, unless the new save would have a worse result than the original save, in which case nothing happens. You can use perfected mind against a given effect only once.

Divine Lance.name: Divine Lance
Divine Lance.description:
You unleash a beam of divine energy. Make a ranged spell attack against the target's AC. On a hit, the target takes 2d4 spirit damage (double damage on a critical hit).

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Peng.name: 鹏 Peng
Peng.publicNotes:
鹏是一种巨大的鸟类，能毫不费力地飞翔在最高的云层间。它们明亮的羽毛让人很难在蔚蓝的空中瞥见它们的身形，但只要有耐心，观测者就可能注意到一些速度快到不可能是云的移动物。

美丽且优雅的鹏有着最不可思议的起源：残忍的鲲，一条充满怨恨的鱼怪，其对大海深处的偏好与鹏对明亮、开阔的天空的热爱互相对照。在鲲为获得一颗高贵的心而通过沐浴于阳光下来牺牲自己的力量后，它们变成了这种壮丽的鸟，其会尽力避免暴力，除非它们必须战斗以保持自由。鹏不求危险或刺激；他们只想继续自己的漫长旅行，并不受干扰地飞翔。

鹏那冷静与平和的天性是如此强大，以至于仅是它的存在就能平息风暴与狂风。水手和领航员们认为，看到鹏是好运的象征。每当天空湛蓝、天气在很长一段时间都很温和的时候，人们就会把这种好海况归功于一位看不见的鹏。

Calm Weather Aura.name: 平和天气灵光 Calm Weather Aura
Calm Weather Aura.description: 1英里。一头鹏周围的天气总是略有云彩、微风怡人，气温总是处于本季节中温暖的水平。试图在此光环中改变天气的生物（例如使用操控天气仪式或造风术 等局部效果）必须成功通过@Check[will|dc:33]豁免。否则（改变天气的）效果就会被打断。鹏可以通过单动作激活或关闭灵光（这个动作具有专注特征）。

Windslice.name: 驭风者 Windslice
Windslice.description: 鹏能在任何风中从容不迫地飞行。鹏忽略由风引起的困难地形，也不需要在大风中进行空中机动受训技能动作。

Cloud Cover.name: 云层掩蔽 Cloud Cover
Cloud Cover.description: 鹏呼出一片密云，把自己笼罩在云雾中。鹏在下一轮结束前都获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]。

Flap Wings.name: 振翅 Flap Wings
Flap Wings.description: 鹏拍打翅膀，创造出一股强大的寒气，将敌人推开。距鹏10尺内的所有生物受到@Damage[3d6[bludgeoning]]伤害和@Damage[3d6[cold]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic]豁免）。豁免失败的生物会被推离10尺；大失败则被推离20尺并被击至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。鹏在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Flap Wings]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用此能力。

Cone of Cold.name: Cone of Cold
Cone of Cold.description:
Icy cold rushes forth from your hands. You deal 12d6 cold damage to creatures in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Wall of Wind (At Will).name: Wall of Wind (At Will)
Wall of Wind (At Will).description:
You create a barrier of gusting winds that hinders anything moving through it. The wall of swirling winds is 5 feet thick, 60 feet long, and 30 feet high. The wall stands vertically, but you can shape its path. Though the wall of wind distorts the air, it does not hamper sight. The wall has the following effects.

  • Ammunition from physical ranged attacks-such as arrows, bolts, sling bullets, and other objects of similar size-can't pass through the wall. Attacks with bigger ranged weapons, such as javelins, take a -2 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls if their paths pass through the wall. Massive ranged weapons and spell effects that don't create physical objects pass through the wall with no penalty.
  • The wall is difficult terrain to creatures attempting to move overland through it. Gases, including creatures in gaseous form, can't pass through the wall.
  • A creature that attempts to fly through the wall using a move action must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature can move through the wall normally this turn.

Success The flying creature can move through the wall this turn, but the wall is difficult terrain.

Failure The wall stops the movement of the flying creature, and any remaining movement from its current action is wasted.

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature is pushed 10 feet away from the wall.

Gust of Wind (At Will).name: Gust of Wind (At Will)
Gust of Wind (At Will).description:
A violent wind issues forth from your palm, blowing from the point where you are when you cast the spell to the line's opposite end. The wind extinguishes small non-magical fires, disperses fog and mist, blows objects of light Bulk or less around, and pushes larger objects. Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save. Large or smaller creatures that later move into the gust must attempt the save on entering.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature can't move against the wind.

Failure The creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. If it was flying, it suffers the effects of critical failure instead.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 30 feet in the wind's direction, knocked Prone, and takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage.

Phuthi.name: 普希·努瓦 Phuthi
Phuthi.blurb: 女性鬣狗人承流学会化形者

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
化形者变成中型气元素，或变回鬣狗人形态。在元素形态下，她拥有飞行速度60尺，她的移动不会触发反应动作，并且她唯一能使用的打击是带有灵巧特征的狂风打击（造成@Damage[(3d8+5)[bludgeoning]]伤害，外加@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{击倒 Knockdown}）。她在此形态下无法施法。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Drain Bonded Item.name: 汲取联结物品 Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 化形者在自己的回合中尚未行动

效果 在此回合中，化形者能再次施放一个她已经施放过的准备法术，不需要消耗法术位。

Planar Terra-cotta Soldier.name: 次元兵马俑士兵 Planar Terra-cotta Soldier
Planar Terra-cotta Soldier.publicNotes:
兵马俑守护古代统治者的陵墓，在那里不休不眠地警戒，只有当入有入侵者闯入盗墓或玷污陵墓时才会活动起来。每个战士都是用粘土精心制作而成，并各自具有独特的特征。

兵马俑有6英尺高，600磅重。

Planar Step.name: 次元快步 Planar Step
Planar Step.description: 次元兵马俑士兵可以在主物质位面的裂缝中穿行，立刻将自己传送到60尺内一个地方。它在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Planar Step]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用次元快步。

equipment-Composite Shortbow.name: Composite Shortbow
equipment-Composite Shortbow.description: This shortbow is made from horn, wood, and sinew laminated together to increase the power of its pull and the force of its projectile. Its compact size and power make it a favorite of mounted archers. Any time an ability is specifically restricted to a shortbow, it also applies to composite shortbows unless otherwise stated.

equipment-Longsword.name: Longsword
equipment-Longsword.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.

Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield
Steel Shield.description:
Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10

equipment-Arrows.name: Arrows
equipment-Arrows.description: These projectiles are the ammunition for bows. The shaft of an arrow is made of wood. It is stabilized in flight by fletching at one end and bears a metal head on the other.

Planar Terra-cotta Squadron.name: 次元兵马俑卫队 Planar Terra-cotta Squadron
Planar Terra-cotta Squadron.publicNotes:
兵马俑守护古代统治者的陵墓，在那里不休不眠地警戒，只有当入有入侵者闯入盗墓或玷污陵墓时才会活动起来。每个战士都是用粘土精心制作而成，并各自具有独特的特征。

这些被制造出来的战士作为训练有素的小队紧密协作，击退入侵者。

Planar Step.name: 次元快步 Planar Step
Planar Step.description: 兵马俑卫队可以在主物质位面的裂缝中穿行，立刻将自己传送到90尺内一个地方。它们在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Planar Step]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用次元快步。

Aim as One.name: 弓箭齐发 Aim as One
Aim as One.description: 部队进行一次远程齐射，射程100尺，对@Template[burst|distance:10]{10尺爆发}范围造成[[/r 3d8+13]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:33|basic]豁免）。如果卫队规模被缩减至8格或更小，则爆发范围减少为@Template[burst|distance:5]{5尺}。

Raise Shields.name: 举起盾墙 Raise Shields
Raise Shields.description: 部队举起盾墙，效果如同单个生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{举起盾牌 Raise a Shield}。

Strike as One.name: 整齐划一 Strike as One
Strike as One.description:
A到3

频率 每轮一次

效果 卫队对5尺内的所有生物进行近战攻击（@Check[reflex|dc:30|basic]豁免）。该伤害取决于花费的动作：

A @Damage[2d8[slashing]]伤害。

2 @Damage[(3d8+13)[slashing]]伤害。

3 @Damage[(4d8+16)[slashing]]伤害。

Troop Movement.name: 部队移动 Troop Movement
Troop Movement.description: 当部队行走时，它首先以一个自由动作重整队列，聚集成20尺*20尺方格的队列（减去任何损失的方格），然后以满速度移动。它在移动时如同一个巨形生物那般；举例来说，如果任何方格进入了困难地形，则整个部队都需要花费额外的移动力。

Steel Shield.description:
Like wooden shields, steel shields come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Though more expensive than wooden shields, they are much more durable.

Hardness HP BT
5 20 10
Steel Shield.name: Steel Shield

Portal Eater.name: 传送门吞噬者 Portal Eater
Portal Eater.allSaves: 对抗魔法的豁免有+1状态加值
Portal Eater.blurb: 异次元能量的宇宙吞噬者

Eat Portal.name: 食门 Eat Portal
Eat Portal.description:
需求 传送门吞噬者的鸟喙并未擒获生物

触发 一个生物在传送门吞噬者50尺内的地方传送或被召唤

效果 传送门吞噬者尝试吞噬传送门。它对触发的效果尝试一次反制检定（反制调整值+33，反制等级9级）。如果效果被成功反制，该生物出现在传送门吞噬者的鸟喙中，并且传送门吞噬者自动@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{擒获 Grabs}该生物。

Enormous.name: 超巨型 Enormous
Enormous.description: 传送门吞噬者是特别巨大的生物，它占据10乘10的方格（50尺乘50尺）。

Reflect Spell.name: 反射法术 Reflect Spell
Reflect Spell.description:
触发 一个生物将传送门吞噬者作为施法目标

效果 传送门吞噬者尝试反制该法术（反制调整值+32，反制等级9级）。如果法术被成功反制，施法者将被作为法术目标。

Unfurl Realities.name: 展开实相 Unfurl Realities
Unfurl Realities.description: 传送门吞噬者展开它的窃取实相水晶斗篷，释放出一波宇宙能量，施展@Template[emanation|distance:60]范围的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{虹光喷射 Prismatic Spray}，DC39。传送门吞噬者无法在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Unfurl Realities]]{1d4轮}内再次使用展开实相。

+1 status to all saves vs. magic.name: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Quaking Footfall.name: 撼地步伐 Quaking Footfall
Quaking Footfall.disable: 通过3次@Check[athletics|dc:39|name:加固一个小型建筑或地表]（受训），@Check[crafting|dc:39|name:加固一个小型建筑或地表]（受训），或@Check[engineering|dc:39|name:加固一个小型建筑或地表]{Engineering Lore}（受训） 检定加固一个小型建筑或地表来减少地震对区域的影响；@Check[performance|dc:41|name:让魔加鲁冷静]（传奇）让魔加鲁短暂地冷静。
Quaking Footfall.hazarddescription: 魔加鲁加快步伐，它周围的大地颤抖起来，就像一场猛烈的地震。

Quake.name: 撼地 Quake
Quake.description:
触发 魔加鲁移动至少60尺

效果 从魔加鲁所在空间弥漫@Template[emanation|distance:120]{120尺范围}内的会发生地震。这会造成多种不同的效果，取决于玩家角色在地震时处于什么地点。

在城市的大部分地区，地表变成困难地形，在地面上的生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}，持续1轮。

在城市中有地下空间的地区（例如下水道、天坑或地下陵墓）,地表会形成裂隙，在这些地区的生物除非通过@Check[reflex|dc:40]豁免，否则将掉进40尺深的洞里。

在海湾、海滩和其他面积相对较大但较浅的水域，魔加鲁的移动会产生危险的巨浪。水里的生物和距离海岸线60尺范围内的生物会被巨浪冲击，造成@Damage[3d8[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:35|basic]豁免）。如果豁免大失败，生物还会被瞬间卷入60尺外、60尺深的海里。

Body Slam.name: 身体投掷 Body Slam
Body Slam.description:
需求 捣达正擒抱一个生物。

效果 捣达将该生物摔投到地面上。该生物受到@Damage[8d6[bludgeoning]]伤害并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。擒抱结束。

Leaping Catch.name: 飞扑 Leaping Catch
Leaping Catch.description: 捣达在飞跃中抓住敌人对其擒抱。他进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leap}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump}。他必须如常进行运动技能检定来执行这个动作，但无论是何种，DC都等于他在空中移动的尺数。在该次跳跃中任何一点，捣达可以进行一次运动检定@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}一个目标。在跳跃的检定完成后，他（若擒抱成功，还有被擒抱的生物）一同倒地。二者都不会从这次坠落中受到伤害。

Titan Wrestler.name: 巨人摔角术 Titan Wrestler
Titan Wrestler.description: 捣达可以对最多比自己大两个体型的生物使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}。

Whirlwind Toss.name: 人肉大风车 Whirlwind Toss
Whirlwind Toss.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 捣达正@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}一个生物。

效果 捣达将擒抱的生物抓牢，旋转起来用他攻击触及内的任何生物，最后把他丢出去。捣达进行一次@Check[athletics|defense:fortitude]检定，对抗被擒抱生物的强韧豁免DC。

大成功 捣达将他甩出很远。擒抱结束。被擒抱生物被甩飞到10尺内一格，受到@Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]]伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。所有邻接捣达的生物受到等量钝击伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:34|basic]豁免）。

成功 如同大成功，不过被擒抱生物只会被甩飞到5尺内一格，且伤害为@Damage[6d6[bludgeoning]]伤害。

失败 捣达没有成功制住目标。擒抱结束，被擒抱生物倒地。

大失败 捣达失去了对目标的控制，擒抱结束。

Reactive Strike (Special).name: 反应打击 Reactive Strike (特殊)
Reactive Strike (Special).description:
当有生物触发捣达的反应打击时，他可以选择用运动技能@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}触发生物代替这次近战打击。若擒抱成功，同样可以打断触发的操作动作。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Attack of Opportunity (Special).name: Attack of Opportunity (Special)
Attack of Opportunity (Special).description:
When a creature triggers Ran-to's Attack of Opportunity, he can attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the triggering creature instead of making a melee Strike. He can still disrupt a triggering manipulate action if he critically succeeds his attempt.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

equipment-Halfling Sling Staff.name: Halfling Sling Staff
equipment-Halfling Sling Staff.description: This staff ends in a Y-shaped split that cradles a sling. The length of the staff provides excellent leverage when used two-handed to fling rocks or bullets from the sling.

equipment-Gauntlet.name: Gauntlet
equipment-Gauntlet.description: A pair of these metal gloves comes with full plate, half plate, and splint armor; they can also be purchased separately and worn with other types of armor. They not only protect your hands but also transform your hands into lethal weapons.

equipment-Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
equipment-Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment-Sling Bullets.name: Sling Bullets
equipment-Sling Bullets.description: These are small metal balls, typically either iron or lead, designed to be used as ammunition in slings.

Body Slam.name: 身体投掷 Body Slam
Body Slam.description:
需求 捣达正擒抱或束缚一个生物。

效果 捣达将该生物摔投到地面上。该生物受到@Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]]伤害（@Check[fortitude|dc:37|basic]豁免）并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。擒抱结束。

Greater Leaping Catch.name: 高等飞扑 Greater Leaping Catch
Greater Leaping Catch.description: 捣达纵身一跃，在腾飞途中尝试对敌人擒抱。他进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leap}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2HJ4yuEFY1Cast4h]{跳高 High Jump}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{跳远 Long Jump}。他的最大距离为75 尺。他必须如常进行运动技能检定来执行这个动作，但无论是何种，DC 都等于他在空中移动的尺数的一半。在该次跳跃中任何一点，捣达可以进行一次运动检定@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}一个目标。在跳跃检定完成后，他（若擒抱成功，还有被擒抱的生物）一同倒地。捣达不会在使用此能力时受到坠落伤害，但擒抱的目标会受到和坠落距离相配的坠落伤害。

Whirlwind Toss.name: 人肉大风车 Whirlwind Toss
Whirlwind Toss.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 捣达正@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{受擒 Grabbed}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}着一个生物。

效果 捣达将擒抱的生物抓牢，旋转起来用他攻击触及内的任何生物，最后把他丢出去。捣达进行一次@Check[athletics|defense:fortitude]检定，对抗被擒抱生物的强韧DC。

大成功 捣达将他甩出很远。擒抱结束。被擒抱生物被甩飞到10 尺内一格，受到@Damage[12d6[bludgeoning]]伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。所有邻接捣达的生物受到等量钝击伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:37|basic]豁免）。

成功 如同大成功，不过被擒抱生物只会被甩飞到5尺内一格，且伤害为@Damage[8d6[bludgeoning]]伤害。

失败 捣达没有成功制住目标。擒抱结束，被擒抱生物倒地。

大失败 捣达失去了对目标的控制，擒抱结束。

Reactive Strike (Special).name: 反应打击 Reactive Strike (特殊)
Reactive Strike (Special).description:
当有生物触发捣达的反应打击时，他可以选择用运动技能@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}触发生物代替这次近战打击。若擒抱成功，同样可以打断触发的操作动作。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Titan Wrestler.name: 巨人摔角手 Titan Wrestler
Titan Wrestler.description: 捣达可以对最多比自己大两个体型的生物使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}。

Attack of Opportunity (Special).name: Attack of Opportunity (Special)
Attack of Opportunity (Special).description:
When a creature triggers Ran-to's Attack of Opportunity, he can attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} the triggering creature instead of making a melee Strike. He can still disrupt a triggering manipulate action if he critically succeeds his attempt.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

equipment-Gauntlet.name: Gauntlet
equipment-Gauntlet.description: A pair of these metal gloves comes with full plate, half plate, and splint armor; they can also be purchased separately and worn with other types of armor. They not only protect your hands but also transform your hands into lethal weapons.

equipment-Halfling Sling Staff.name: Halfling Sling Staff
equipment-Halfling Sling Staff.description: This staff ends in a Y-shaped split that cradles a sling. The length of the staff provides excellent leverage when used two-handed to fling rocks or bullets from the sling.

equipment-Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
equipment-Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment-Explosive Ammunition (Greater).name: Explosive Ammunition (Greater)
equipment-Explosive Ammunition (Greater).description:
Activate A Interact

This piece of ammunition is coated in gritty black soot. When activated explosive ammunition hits a target, the missile explodes in a @Template[burst|distance:10], dealing [[/r10d6]] fire damage to each creature in the area (including the target). Each creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:30|basic|name:Greater Explosive Ammunition] save.

equipment-Sling Bullets.name: Sling Bullets
equipment-Sling Bullets.description: These are small metal balls, typically either iron or lead, designed to be used as ammunition in slings.

Razu.name: 拉祖 Razu
Razu.blurb: 男性天狗大师吟游诗人

Bow Basher.name: 琴弓痛击者 Bow Basher
Bow Basher.description: 拉祖挥舞着它乐器上独特的镶嵌了符文的琴弓作为致命武器。他历经数十载的训练让他能够用自己的战斗呼号来增强它，因此它还能造成音波伤害。通过将琴弓的弓套固定在末端，它能将其当做一把类似短矛的武器使用，造成穿刺伤害。任何其他使用二胡琴弓的生物都无法用它造成音波伤害，但该武器依然拥有上面所列出的各项特征。如果除去符文，这把琴弓值50gp。

Incredible Volume.name: 惊人音量 Incredible Volume
Incredible Volume.description: 正常情况下射程不超过60尺或弥漫范围不超过60尺半径的听觉效果，经由拉祖施放后，其射程或弥漫半径增幅到300尺。正常情况下射程超过60尺或弥漫半径超过60尺的听觉效果，经由拉祖施放后，其射程或弥漫半径增幅到1200尺（除非该效果本身比这更远）。他的表演最远在10英里外都能听见。

equipment-+3 Greater Striking Erhu Bow.description: Razu wields his instrument's unique rune- enchanted bow as a deadly weapon. His decades of training with the item allow him to augment it with his own battle cries so that it also deals sonic damage. By attaching the bow's case to its end, he can change the weapon's damage to piercing and use the bow much like a short spear. Any other creature who wields the erhu bow does not deal sonic damage with it, but the weapon otherwise possesses the traits listed above. If sold without its runes, the bow is worth 50 gp.
equipment-+3 Greater Striking Erhu Bow.name: +3 Greater Striking Erhu Bow

Unfathomable Song.name: Unfathomable Song
Unfathomable Song.description:
Fleeting notes of a strange and unnatural song fill the air, overtaking the mind. Each target must attempt a Will save when you cast the spell, and again the first time you Sustain this Spell each round. A creature needs to attempt only one save against the song each round, and you have to keep the same targets when you Sustain the Spell.

Critical Success The target is unaffected, can't be affected on subsequent rounds, and is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Success The target is unaffected this round, but it can be affected on subsequent rounds.

Failure Roll 1d4 on the table below.

Critical Failure Roll 1d4+1 on the table below.

Result Effect
1 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}
2 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round
3 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} for 1 round
4 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round
5 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for an unlimited duration

Wail of the Banshee.name: Wail of the Banshee
Wail of the Banshee.description:
Your scream chills the souls of enemies that hear it. Each living enemy in the area takes 8d10 void damage and must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes full damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} [[/r 1d4]].

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4}.

Disappearance.name: Disappearance
Disappearance.description: You shroud a creature from others' senses. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, not just to sight but to all senses, allowing the target to count as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} no matter what precise and imprecise senses an observer might have. It's still possible for a creature to find the target by Seeking, looking for disturbed dust, hearing gaps in the sound spectrum, or finding some other way to discover the presence of an otherwise-undetectable creature.

Spirit Song.name: Spirit Song
Spirit Song.description:
Your eldritch song sends pulsing waves of ethereal energy to attack creatures' spirits in the area, dealing 18d6 force damage. Because spirit song affects creatures' spirits, it can damage a target projecting its consciousness (such as via project image) or possessing another creature even if the target's body is elsewhere. The vibrating waves of spiritual song penetrate into, but not through, solid barriers, damaging incorporeal creatures hiding in solid objects in the area but not passing onward to damage creatures in other rooms. Possessed creatures aren't harmed by the song. The song doesn't harm creatures that have no spirit, such as constructs.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Uncontrollable Dance.description:
The target is overcome with an all-consuming urge to dance. For the duration of the spell, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and can't use reactions. While affected, the creature can't use actions with the move trait except to dance, using the Stride action to move up to half its Speed.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The spell's duration is 3 rounds, and the target must spend at least 1 action each turn dancing.

Failure The spell's duration is 1 minute, and the target must spend at least 2 actions each turn dancing.

Critical Failure The spell's duration is 1 minute, and the target must spend all its actions each turn dancing.
Uncontrollable Dance.name: Uncontrollable Dance

Collective Transposition.description:
You teleport the targets to new positions within the area. The creatures must each be able to fit in their new space, and their positions must be unoccupied, entirely within the area, and in your line of sight. Unwilling creatures can attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target can teleport if it wants, but it chooses the destination within range.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure You teleport the target and choose its destination.

Heightened (+1) The number of targets increases by 1.
Collective Transposition.name: Collective Transposition

Mislead.description:
You turn yourself @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} and create an illusory duplicate of yourself. When you Sustain the Spell, you can mentally dictate a course of action for your duplicate to follow that round. Your duplicate acts as though it had your full number of actions, though it can't actually affect anything in the environment. Both the duplicate and your invisibility persist for the spell's duration. Performing a hostile action doesn't end mislead's invisibility, just like a 4th-rank invisibility spell. A creature that determines the duplicate is an illusion doesn't necessarily know you're invisible, and one that can see your invisible form doesn't necessarily know your duplicate is an illusion.

If you Cast a Spell, attack, or otherwise interact with another creature, as a part of that action you can attempt a Deception check against observers' Perception DCs to convince them your duplicate used that action. This doesn't fool anyone who's aware your duplicate is an illusion, nor does it work if the attack obviously couldn't have come from the duplicate. For instance, if you fired a ray, you could make it look like it came from the duplicate as long as the duplicate was positioned appropriately, but if you attacked with a sword and your duplicate was across the room from the target, your Deception check would automatically fail.
Mislead.name: Mislead

Wall of Force.description:
You form an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} wall of pure magical force up to 50 feet long and up to 20 feet high. The wall has no discernible thickness. You must create the wall in an unbroken open space so its edges don't pass through any creatures or objects, or the spell is lost. The wall has AC 10, Hardness 30, and 60 Hit Points, and it's immune to critical hits and precision damage. The wall blocks physical effects from passing through it, and because it's made of force, it blocks incorporeal and ethereal creatures as well. Teleportation effects can pass through the barrier, as can visual effects (since the wall is invisible). Wall of force is immune to counteracting effects of its level or lower, but the wall is automatically destroyed by a disintegrate spell of any level or by contact with a rod of cancellation or sphere of annihilation.

Heightened (+2) The Hit Points of the wall increases by 20.
Wall of Force.name: Wall of Force

Crushing Despair.description:
You inflict despair on creatures in the area. The effects for each creature are determined by its Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success For 1 round, the creature can't use reactions and must attempt another save at the start of its turn; on a failure, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for that turn as it sobs uncontrollably.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature is automatically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Heightened (7th) The area increases to a 60-foot cone.
Crushing Despair.name: Crushing Despair

Hallucination.description:
The target consistently detects one thing as another, can't detect something that's there, or detects something that's not there, though it doesn't alter their beliefs. You choose which of these effects applies, and you determine the specifics of the hallucination. For example, you could make the target see all elves as humans, be unable to detect the presence of their brother, see their beloved pocket watch on their person even when it isn't, or see a tower in the center of town. The target can attempt an initial Will save, with effects below. They also receive a Will save to disbelieve the hallucination every time they Seek or directly interact with the hallucination. For example, the target could attempt to disbelieve the hallucination each time they interacted with an elf, bumped into their brother accidentally, tried to check their pocket watch, or studied the tower. The target can attempt to disbelieve with a large circumstance bonus in situations determined by the GM, such as if the target attempted to climb the nonexistent tower.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature perceives what you chose until it disbelieves, but it knows what the hallucination is.

Failure The creature perceives what you chose until it disbelieves.

Critical Failure The creature perceives what you chose until it disbelieves, and it trusts its false senses, taking a -4 circumstance penalty to saves to disbelieve.

Heightened (6th) Choose to either target up to 10 creatures or change the spell's duration to until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Heightened (8th) Choose to either target any number of creatures or change the spell's duration to unlimited.
Hallucination.name: Hallucination

Shadow Blast.name: Shadow Blast
Shadow Blast.description:
You shape the quasi-real substance of the Shadow Plane into a blast. Choose acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, force, piercing, slashing, or sonic damage, and choose a 30-foot cone, a 15-foot burst within 120 feet, or a 50-foot line. The blast deals 5d8 damage of the type you chose to each creature in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Shadow Siphon.name: Shadow Siphon
Shadow Siphon.description:
Trigger A spell or magical effect deals damage.

Exchanging material energy with that of the Shadow Plane, you transform the triggering spell into a partially illusory version of itself. Attempt to counteract the target spell. If the attempt is successful, any creatures that would be damaged by the spell instead take only half as much damage, but the spell otherwise works as normal. Treat shadow siphon's counteract rank as 2 higher for this attempt.

Telepathic Bond.name: Telepathic Bond
Telepathic Bond.description: The targets can communicate telepathically with any or all of the other targets from any point on the same planet.

Blink.name: Blink
Blink.description:
You blink quickly between the Material Plane and the Ethereal Plane. You gain resistance 5 to all damage (except force). You can Sustain the Spell to vanish and reappear 10 feet away in a random direction determined by the GM; the movement doesn't trigger reactions. At the end of your turn, you vanish and reappear as above.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.ZlsuhS9J0S3PuvCO]{Spell Effect: Blink}

Heightened (+2) The resistance increases by 3.

Dimension Door.name: Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Veil.name: Veil
Veil.description:
You disguise the targets as other creatures of the same body shape and roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds). The disguise can hide the targets' identities or let them appear to be of another ancestry, but it's not precise enough to impersonate specific individuals. The spell doesn't change voice, scent, or mannerisms. You choose the disguise for each target; for example, you could make one target appear to be a dwarf and another an elf. Casting veil counts as setting up a disguise for the purpose of the Impersonate action. It allows the target to ignore any circumstance penalties they might take for being disguised as dissimilar creatures, and it gives the targets a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through their disguises, and add their level even if untrained. You can Dismiss any or all of these disguises.

Heightened (5th) The spell also disguises the targets' voices and scents; it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

Heightened (7th) The targets can appear as any creature of the same size, even specific individuals. You must have seen an individual to reproduce their appearance. The spell also disguises the targets' voices and scents; it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

Dirge of Doom.name: Dirge of Doom
Dirge of Doom.description: Foes within the area are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}. They can't reduce their Frightened value below 1 while they remain in the area.

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description:
Magic empowers the target to act faster. It gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to 6 creatures.

Mind Reading.description:
With a cursory mental touch, you attempt to read the target's mind. It must attempt a Will save. The target then becomes temporarily immune to your mind reading for 1 hour.

Critical Success The target perceives vague surface thoughts from you when you Cast the Spell.

Success You find out whether the target's Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Failure You perceive vague surface thoughts from the target when you Cast the Spell, and you find out whether its Intelligence modifier is higher than, equal to, or lower than yours.

Critical Failure As failure, and for the duration of the spell, you can Sustain the Spell to detect the target's surface thoughts again. The target doesn't receive any additional saves.
Mind Reading.name: Mind Reading

Slow.description:
You dilate the flow of time around the target, slowing its actions.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} for 1 minute.

Heightened (6th) You can target up to 10 creatures.
Slow.name: Slow

See Invisibility.description:
You can see @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} creatures and objects. They appear to you as translucent shapes, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to you.

Heightened (5th) The spell has a duration of 8 hours.
See Invisibility.name: See Invisibility

Shatter.name: Shatter
Shatter.description:
A high-frequency sonic attack shatters a nearby object. You deal 2d10 sonic damage to the object, ignoring the object's Hardness if it is 4 or lower.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10, and the Hardness the spell ignores increases by 2.

Silence.name: Silence
Silence.description:
The target makes no sound, preventing creatures from noticing it using hearing or other senses alone. The target can't use sonic attacks, nor can it use actions with the auditory trait. This prevents it from casting spells that include verbal components.

Heightened (4th) The spell effect emanates from the touched creature, silencing all sound in or passing through a 10- foot radius and preventing any auditory and sonic effects in the affected area. While within the radius, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target. Depending upon the position of the effect, a creature might notice the lack of sound reaching it (blocking off the noise coming from a party, for example).

Triple Time.name: Triple Time
Triple Time.description:
You dance at a lively tempo, speeding your allies' movement. You and all allies in the area gain a +10-foot status bonus to all Speeds for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.HtaDbgTIzdiTiKLX]{Spell Effect: Triple Time}

Charm.name: Charm
Charm.description:
To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure The target's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Friendly} toward you. If it was Friendly, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Helpful}. It can't use hostile actions against you.

Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes Helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.

Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

Counter Performance.name: Counter Performance
Counter Performance.description:
Trigger You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an auditory or visual effect.

Your performance protects you and your allies. Roll a Performance check for a type you know: an auditory performance if the trigger was auditory, or a visual one for a visual trigger. You and allies in the area can use the better result between your Performance check and the saving throw.

Dancing Lights.description: You create up to four floating lights, no two of which are more than 10 feet apart. Each sheds light like a torch. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move any number of lights up to 60 feet. Each light must remain within 120 feet of you and within 10 feet of all others, or it winks out.
Dancing Lights.name: Dancing Lights

Detect Magic.description:
You send out a pulse that registers the presence of magic. You receive no information beyond the presence or absence of magic. You can choose to ignore magic you're fully aware of, such as the magic items and ongoing spells of you and your allies.

You detect illusion magic only if that magic's effect has a lower level than the rank of your detect magic spell. However, items that have an illusion aura but aren't deceptive in appearance (such as an invisibility potion) typically are detected normally.

Heightened (3rd) You learn the school of magic for the highest-level effect within range that the spell detects. If multiple effects are equally strong, the GM determines which you learn.

Heightened (4th) As 3rd level, but you also pinpoint the source of the highest-level magic. Like for an imprecise sense, you don't learn the exact location, but can narrow down the source to within a 5-foot cube (or the nearest if larger than that).
Detect Magic.name: Detect Magic

Ghost Sound.name: Ghost Sound
Ghost Sound.description:
You create an auditory illusion of simple sounds that has a maximum volume equal to four normal humans shouting. The sounds emanate from a square you designate within range. You can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds (such as music).

Heightened (3rd) The range increases to 60 feet.

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet.

Inspire Courage.name: Inspire Courage
Inspire Courage.description:
You inspire yourself and your allies with words or tunes of encouragement. You and all allies in the area gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against fear effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.beReeFroAx24hj83]{Spell Effect: Courageous Anthem}

Lingering Composition.name: Lingering Composition
Lingering Composition.description:
You add a flourish to your composition to extend its benefits. If your next action is to cast a cantrip composition with a duration of 1 round, attempt a Performance check. The DC is usually a standard-difficulty DC of a level equal to the highest-level target of your composition, but the GM can assign a different DC based on the circumstances. The effect depends on the result of your check.

Critical Success The composition lasts 4 rounds.

Success The composition lasts 3 rounds.

Failure The composition lasts 1 round, but you don't spend the Focus Point for casting this spell.

Read Aura.name: Read Aura
Read Aura.description:
You focus on the target object, opening your mind to perceive magical auras. When the casting is complete, you know whether that item is magical, and if it is, you learn the school of magic.

If the object is illusory, you detect this only if the effect's level is lower than the rank of your read aura spell.

Heightened (3rd) You can target up to 10 objects.

Heightened (6th) You can target any number of objects.

Sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
Sanctuary.description:
You ward a creature with protective energy that deters enemy attacks. Creatures attempting to attack the target must attempt a Will save each time. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends.

Critical Success Sanctuary ends.

Success The creature can attempt its attack and any other attacks against the target this turn.

Failure The creature can't attack the target and wastes the action. It can't attempt further attacks against the target this turn.

Critical Failure The creature wastes the action and can't attempt to attack the target for the rest of sanctuary's duration.

Soothe.name: Soothe
Soothe.description:
You grace the target's mind, boosting its mental defenses and healing its wounds. The target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell and gains a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nkk4O5fyzrC0057i]{Spell Effect: Soothe}

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.

Telekinetic Projectile.name: Telekinetic Projectile
Telekinetic Projectile.description:
You hurl a loose, unattended object that is within range and that has 1 Bulk or less at the target. Make a spell attack roll against the target. If you hit, you deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage-as appropriate for the object you hurled-equal to 1d6 plus your spellcasting ability modifier. No specific traits or magic properties of the hurled item affect the attack or the damage.

Critical Success You deal double damage.

Success You deal full damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Ventriloquism.description:
Whenever you speak or make any other sound vocally, you can make your vocalization seem to originate from somewhere else within 60 feet, and you can change that apparent location freely as you vocalize. Any creature that hears the sound can attempt to disbelieve your illusion.

Heightened (2nd) The spell's duration increases to 1 hour, and you can also change the tone, quality, and other aspects of your voice. Before a creature can attempt to disbelieve your illusion, it must actively attempt a Perception check or otherwise use actions to interact with the sound.
Ventriloquism.name: Ventriloquism

equipment-Studded Leather Armor.name: Studded Leather Armor
equipment-Studded Leather Armor.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.

equipment-Greater Maestro's Instrument (.name: Greater Maestro's Instrument (Erhu)
equipment-Greater Maestro's Instrument (.description:
A maestro's instrument can be crafted in the form of any variety of handheld musical instruments. A maestro's instrument grants you a +3 item bonus to Performance checks while playing music with the instrument.

Activate—Charming Performance 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You play the instrument, causing it to cast a 8th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm} spell with DC 38.

Craft Requirements You must supply a casting of charm of the appropriate rank.

equipment-Potion of Tongues.name: Potion of Tongues
equipment-Potion of Tongues.description: This sour potion enlivens your tongue with unusual flavors and uncommon eloquence, allowing you to speak and understand all languages for 4 hours after you drink it. This doesn't allow you to read these languages in their written form.

equipment-Truesight Potion.name: Truesight Potion
equipment-Truesight Potion.description: Upon drinking this clear, refreshing potion, you can see things as they actually are. You gain the benefits of a 7th level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{Truesight} spell that has a counteract modifier of [[/r 1d20+25]].

Rivka (Cimurlian).name: 怪兽螨(西穆利安) Rivka (Cimurlian)
Rivka (Cimurlian).publicNotes:
怪兽螨是一类依附于怪兽体表的寄生性怪物。它们的本来面貌好似巨型蟑螂，长着8只剃刀般的足和两张嘴——一张生在两个凶恶的钳子之间，另一张开在下腹部的则大得多。通过这第二张嘴，它们得以吸食自己依附的怪兽的原初能量。

紧跟着怪兽的袭击，怪兽螨在那之后会从宿主的身体上分离，介入灾区，以怪兽使者的身份向毫无戒心的民众索要祭品。据这个残忍的老骗子所言，只有鲜血和黄金才能安抚它们的主人——但当然，怪兽螨在这些献礼送到怪兽手上前就卷走祭品跑路了（但不管怎样，这些祭品对怪兽来说本就没什么意义）。最为可憎的怪兽螨会搜寻废墟中的死者来模仿，用魔法以受人爱戴的城市长者或牧师的面貌示人，好激发市民们的偏执。

饮下怪兽的血液会对怪兽螨的解剖结构产生奇妙的效果，宿主的原初能量能够增强它的防御与进攻能力。其他生物也曾尝试喝下怪兽的血来复制这种现象，但效果总是很糟糕。很显然，怪兽螨是通过与怪兽一同进化，才能代谢它们古老的血液。

Kaiju Blood.name: 怪兽之血 Kaiju Blood
Kaiju Blood.description: 每只怪兽螨都通过吸食怪兽的血液来获得抗力与进攻能力。怪兽螨抵抗的伤害类型与它的怪兽射线能力所造成的伤害取决于它上次吸血的怪兽。一些最常见的怪兽螨包括吸食了西穆利安 Cimurlian（寒冷），贾卡布 Kujiba（虚能），埃格隆 Igroon（酸蚀），魔加鲁 Mogaru（火焰），或约拉克 Yorak（电击）的家伙。

Eviscerate.name: 剔骨 Eviscerate
Eviscerate.description:
需求 怪兽螨在本轮中尚未进行攻击

效果 怪兽螨猛挥它的四个剃刀般的爪子。它进行四次打击：第一次使用最高的攻击加值，后两次攻击骰有-4减值，最后一次则是-8减值。在计算多重攻击减值时此能力视为四次攻击。

Kaiju Ray.name: 怪兽射线 Kaiju Ray
Kaiju Ray.description: 怪兽螨张开它肚子上的嘴，射出一道范围@Template[line|distance:60]的原能能量，造成@Damage[14d6[cold]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic|traits:cold]豁免）。射线造成的伤害类型取决于怪兽螨最近吸了哪只怪兽的血。怪兽螨在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Kaiju Ray]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用此能力。

Illusory Disguise.name: Illusory Disguise
Illusory Disguise.description:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself. The disguise is typically good enough to hide your identity, but not to impersonate a specific individual. The spell doesn't change your voice, scent, or mannerisms. You can change the appearance of your clothing and worn items, such as making your armor look like a dress. Held items are unaffected, and any worn item you remove returns to its true appearance.

Casting illusory disguise counts as setting up a disguise for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{Impersonate} use of Deception; it ignores any circumstance penalties you might take for disguising yourself as a dissimilar creature, it gives you a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through your disguise, and you add your level even if you're untrained. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened (2nd) The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

Heightened (3rd) You can appear as any creature of the same size, even a specific individual. You must have seen an individual to take on their appearance. The spell also disguises your voice and scent, and it gains the auditory and olfactory traits.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise}

Charm (At Will).name: Charm (At Will)
Charm (At Will).description:
To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure The target's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Friendly} toward you. If it was Friendly, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Helpful}. It can't use hostile actions against you.

Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes Helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.

Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

Eviscerate.description:
需求 怪兽螨在本轮中尚未进行攻击

效果 怪兽螨猛挥它的四个剃刀般的爪子。它进行四次打击：第一次使用最高的攻击加值，后两次攻击骰有-4减值，最后一次则是-8减值。在计算多重攻击减值时此能力视为四次攻击。

Kaiju Ray.name: 怪兽射线 Kaiju Ray
Kaiju Ray.description: 怪兽螨张开它肚子上的嘴，射出一道范围@Template[line|distance:60]{60尺线形}的原能能量，造成@Damage[14d6[fire]]伤害（@Check[reflex|dc:32|basic|traits:fire]豁免）。射线造成的伤害类型取决于怪兽螨最近吸了哪只怪兽的血。怪兽螨在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Kaiju Ray]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用此能力。

Charm (At Will).name: Charm (At Will)
Charm (At Will).description:
To the target, your words are honey and your visage seems bathed in a dreamy haze. It must attempt a Will save, with a +4 circumstance bonus if you or your allies recently threatened it or used hostile actions against it.

You can Dismiss the spell. If you use hostile actions against the target, the spell ends. When the spell ends, the target doesn't necessarily realize it was charmed unless its friendship with you or the actions you convinced it to take clash with its expectations, meaning you could potentially convince the target to continue being your friend via mundane means.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and aware you tried to charm it.

Success The target is unaffected but thinks your spell was something harmless instead of charm, unless it identifies the spell.

Failure The target's attitude becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{Friendly} toward you. If it was Friendly, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{Helpful}. It can't use hostile actions against you.

Critical Failure The target's attitude becomes Helpful toward you, and it can't use hostile actions against you.

Heightened (4th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.

Heightened (8th) The duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

Illusory Disguise.name: Illusory Disguise
Illusory Disguise.description:
You create an illusion that causes you to appear as another creature of the same body shape, and with roughly similar height (within 6 inches) and weight (within 50 pounds), as yourself.
